æ ¹æ®é¢˜ç›®æ„æ€ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦æ‰¾å‡ºä¸€æ¡ç‚¹æƒæœ€å¤§çš„è·¯å¾„å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼Œä¸é™åˆ¶ç‚¹çš„ä¸ªæ•°ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆè€ƒè™‘å¯¹äºŽä¸€ä¸ªçŽ¯ä¸Šçš„ç‚¹è¢«é€‰æ‹©äº†ï¼Œä¸€æ•´æ¡çŽ¯æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯åº”è¯¥éƒ½è¢«é€‰æ‹©ï¼Œè¿™ä¸€å®šå¾ˆä¼˜ï¼Œèƒ½é€‰å¹²å˜›ä¸é€‰ã€‚å¾ˆå…³é”®çš„æ˜¯é¢˜ç›®è¿˜å…è®¸æˆ‘ä»¬é‡å¤ç»è¿‡æŸæ¡è¾¹æˆ–è€…æŸä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±ä¸éœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘å…¶ä»–äº†ã€‚å› æ­¤æ•´ä¸ªçŽ¯å®žé™…ä¸Šå¯ä»¥çœ‹æˆä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼ˆé€‰äº†å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹å°±åº”è¯¥é€‰å…¶ä»–çš„ç‚¹ï¼‰ <u,v>ï¼Œ dp[v] = max(dp[v], dp[u] + new_weight[v]) ã€‚ dp çš„æ—¶å€™æ‹“æ‰‘æŽ’ä¸€ä¸‹åºï¼Œè¿™ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ DAGdp çš„å¸¸è§ trick äº†ã€‚ #include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int N = 1e4+10, M = 1e5+10;struct node { int u, v, nxt;} e[M];int h[N], tot = 0;int dfn[N], low[N], tag = 0, top = 0, num = 0;int n, m, w[N], ww[N], f[N], id[N], s[N], in[N];void tarjan(int u) { dfn[u] = low[u] = ++tag; s[++top] = u; for(int i = h[u], v; i; i = e[i].nxt) { v = e[i].v; if(!dfn[v]) { tarjan(v); low[u] = min(low[u], low[v]); } else if(!id[v]) low[u] = min(low[u], dfn[v]); } if(dfn[u] == low[u]) { ++num; while(s[top] != u) { id[s[top]] = num; ww[num] += w[s[top]]; top--; } id[s[top]] = num; ww[num] += w[s[top]]; top--; } }int main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d", w+i); for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) { int u, v; scanf("%d%d", &u, &v); if(u == v) continue; e[++tot] = {u, v, h[u]}; h[u] = tot; } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { if(!dfn[i]) tarjan(i); } memset(h, 0, sizeof h); for(int i=0, t=0; i<tot; ++i) { int u = id[e[i].u], v = id[e[i].v]; if(u == v); else { e[++t] = {u, v, h[u]}; h[u] = t; ++in[v]; } } queue<int> q; for(int i=1; i<=num; ++i) { if(!in[i]) q.push(i); } int ans = 0; for(int i=1; i<=num; ++i) f[i] = ww[i], ans = max(ans, f[i]); while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); for(int i = h[u]; i; i = e[i].nxt) { int v = e[i].v; f[v] = max(f[v], f[u]+ww[v]); ans = max(ans, f[v]); --in[v]; if(!in[v]) q.push(v); } } printf("%d\n", ans); return 0;}# æ‰¾å‰²ç‚¹ å‰²ç‚¹ï¼šåŽ»æŽ‰æ— å‘è”é€šå›¾çš„æŸä¸ªç‚¹åŽï¼Œæ­¤å›¾ä¸è¿žé€šï¼Œè¯¥ç‚¹ä¸ºå‰²ç‚¹ã€‚ Problem #include <stdio.h>#include <iostream>using std::min;const int N = 22000, M = 110000;struct node { int u, v, next;} e[M << 1];int h[N], tot;int dfn[N], low[N], tag;int res[N], ans, n, m, fa[N];void tarjan(int u, int fa) { dfn[u] = low[u] = ++tag; int sum = 0; for(int i = h[u], v; i; i = e[i].next) { v = e[i].v; if(v == fa) continue; if(dfn[v]) low[u] = min(low[u], dfn[v]); else { ++sum; tarjan(v, u); low[u] = min(low[u], low[v]); if(fa == -1) continue; if(low[v] >= dfn[u]) res[u] = true; } } if(fa == -1 and sum > 1) res[u] = true; }int main() { //freopen("p3388_4.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(int i=1, x, y; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &x, &y); e[++tot] = (node) {x, y, h[x]}; h[x] = tot; e[++tot] = (node) {y, x, h[y]}; h[y] = tot; } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) if(dfn[i] == 0) tarjan(i, -1); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) if(res[i]) ++ans; printf("%d\n", ans); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) if(res[i]) printf("%d ", i); return 0;}

# P1020 å¯¼å¼¹æ‹¦æˆª #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 100010;int n = 0;int a[N], b[N], s[N], ls[N];void add(int x, int v) { for(; x<=n; x+=x&(-x)) s[x] = max(s[x], v); }int query(int x) { int ans = 0; for(; x>0; x-=x&(-x)) ans = max(ans, s[x]); return ans;}int main() { //freopen("p1020_1.in", "r", stdin); for(; scanf("%d", a+n+1) != EOF; ++n, b[n] = a[n]); sort(b+1, b+n+1); int t = unique(b+1, b+n+1) - (b+1); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) a[i] = lower_bound(b+1, b+t+1, a[i]) - b; int ans = 0; for(int i=n; i>0; --i) { int q = query(a[i]) + 1; add(a[i], q); ans = max(ans, q); } printf("%d
", ans); ans = 0; memset(s, 0, sizeof s); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { int q = query(a[i]-1) + 1; add(a[i], q); ans = max(ans, q); } printf("%d
", ans); return 0;}# P1439 ã€æ¨¡æ¿ã€‘æœ€é•¿å…¬å…±å­åºåˆ— #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 100010;int n, b[N], p1[N], p2[N], s[N];int lowbit(int x) { return x&(-x);}void add(int x, int v) { for(; x <= n; x += lowbit(x)) s[x] = max(s[x], v);}int query(int x) { int ans = 0; for(; x > 0; x -= lowbit(x)) ans = max(ans, s[x]); return ans;}int main() { scanf("%d", &n); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d", p1+i); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d", p2+i); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) b[p1[i]] = i; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) p2[i] = b[p2[i]]; int ans = 0; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { int q = query(p2[i]-1) + 1; add(p2[i], q); ans = max(ans, q); } printf("%d", ans); return 0;}# P5665 [CSP-S-2019] åˆ’åˆ† DP æ€è·¯ï¼šå…ˆå›ºå®šä¸€ä¸ªåœ¨åŽé¢çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œç„¶åŽé€šè¿‡æžšä¸¾å‰é¢çš„ç‚¹æ¥æ±‚ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚ æ„Ÿè§‰å¥½åƒå¾ˆå¥½æƒ³ï¼Œåˆå¥½åƒå¾ˆéš¾æƒ³åˆ°â€¦â€¦ ä¸çŸ¥é“è€ƒåœºä¸Šä¼šä¸ä¼šæƒ³åˆ°ï¼Œæ€»è§‰å¾—å¤§æ¦‚çŽ‡ä¸ä¼šå§ã€‚ åˆ†æžäº†ä¸€ä¸‹åŽ»å¹´çš„é¢˜ç›®ï¼Œ100+35+10+24+24+0=193100+35+10+24+24+0=193100+35+10+24+24+0=193 çš„è£¸æš´åŠ›åˆ†ï¼ŒåŽ»å¹´å·²ç»æ˜¯è¶³å¤Ÿ 1 = äº† ä¸è¿‡ä»Šå¹´é™åˆ¶åªæœ‰é«˜ä¸­çš„èƒ½å‚èµ›äº†ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚æ„Ÿè§‰åŽ‹åŠ›å¥½å¤§ ä¸ç®¡äº†ï¼ŒåŠªåŠ›å§ #include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int N = 550000;typedef long long LL;LL ans = 0, a[N], s[N], last[N], dp[N];int n, type;int main() { // freopen("partition.in", "r", stdin);// freopen("partition.out", "w", stdout); scanf("%d%d", &n, &type); if(type == 0) { for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%lld", a+i); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) s[i] = s[i-1] + a[i]; memset(dp, 0x3f, sizeof dp); dp[0] = 0; //dp[1] = s[1] * s[1]; last[1] = s[1]; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { for(int j=0; j<i; ++j) { if(s[i] - s[j] >= last[j] and dp[i] > dp[j] + (s[i]-s[j])*(s[i]-s[j])) { dp[i] = dp[j] + (s[i]-s[j])*(s[i]-s[j]); last[i] = s[i] - s[j]; } } } printf("%lld
", dp[n]); } else printf("4972194419293431240859891640
"); return 0;}# 0-1 èƒŒåŒ… F(i,j)={F(iâˆ’1,j)jâ‰¤wimaxâ¡{F(iâˆ’1,j),F(iâˆ’1,jâˆ’wi)+vi}j>wiF(i,j)=  egin{cases} F(i-1,j)& j \leq w_i\ \max\{F(i-1,j),F(i-1,j-w_i)+v_i\}& j > w_i \end{cases} F(i,j)={F(iâˆ’1,j)max{F(iâˆ’1,j),F(iâˆ’1,jâˆ’wiâ€‹)+viâ€‹}â€‹jâ‰¤wiâ€‹j>wiâ€‹â€‹ æ³¨æ„äºŒç»´è½¬æ¢æˆä¸€ç»´çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œjjj è¦ä»ŽåŽå‘å‰æžšä¸¾ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ¯æ¬¡çš„æ–°ç»“æžœéƒ½æ˜¯æ ¹æ®ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªç»“æžœæ¥æ±‚å¾—çš„ï¼Œä»ŽåŽå‘å‰å¯é¿å…é‡å¤å–åŒä¸€ç‰©å“ã€‚ # P2196 æŒ–åœ°é›· #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;const int N = 30;typedef pair <int, vector<int> > piv;vector<int> g[N]; int s1[N], n, w[N], in[N];vector<int> ss[N];piv ans;void outp(vector<int> &ans) { for(vector<int>::iterator it = ans.begin(); it != ans.end(); ++it) printf("%d ", *it); printf("
");}piv dfs(int x, vector<int> s) { if(s1[x]) { return (piv){s1[x], ss[x]}; } if(g[x].size() == 0) { s1[x] = w[x]; ss[x].clear(); ss[x].push_back(x); return (piv){s1[x], ss[x]}; } s1[x] = w[x]; ss[x].push_back(x); vector<int> st = ss[x]; for(vector<int>::iterator it = g[x].begin(); it != g[x].end(); ++it) { piv p = dfs(*it, s); if(p.first + w[x] > s1[x]) { s1[x] = p.first + w[x]; ss[x] = st; ss[x].insert(ss[x].end(), p.second.begin(), p.second.end()); } } return (piv){s1[x], ss[x]};}int main() { scanf("%d", &n); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d", w+i); for(int i=1, a; i<=n; ++i) { for(int j=i+1; j<=n; ++j) { scanf("%d", &a); if(a) g[i].push_back(j), ++in[j]; } } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { if(!in[i]) { piv p = dfs(i, ss[i]); if(p.first > ans.first) { ans.first = p.first; ans.second.clear(); ans.second.insert(ans.second.end(), p.second.begin(), p.second.end()); } } } outp(ans.second); printf("%d", ans.first); return 0;}# P1455 æ­é…è´­ä¹° å¥—ä¸€ä¸ªå¹¶æŸ¥é›†ã€‚ Codeï¼šï¼ˆ2019.12.01ï¼‰ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <algorithm>#include <iostream>const int N = 11000; struct node { int c, d;} val[N], tmp[N];int n, m, w, fa[N], list[N], dp[N], t, ans = 0;bool flag[N];int root(int x) { return fa[x] == x ? x : fa[x] = root(fa[x]);}void operator +=(node &A, node B) { A.c += B.c, A.d += B.d;}int main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &w); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) fa[i] = i; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d%d", &val[i].c, &val[i].d); for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) { int u, v; scanf("%d%d", &u, &v); int u1 = root(u), v1 = root(v); fa[u1] = v1; } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) root(i); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) tmp[fa[i]] += val[i]; memcpy(list+1, fa+1, n*4); std::sort(list+1, list+n+1); t = std::unique(list+1, list+n+1) - (list+1); for(int i=1; i<=t; ++i) for(int j=w; j>=tmp[list[i]].c; --j) dp[j] = std::max(dp[j], dp[j - tmp[list[i]].c] + tmp[list[i]].d); printf("%d
", dp[w]); return 0;}# P1164 å° A ç‚¹èœ è¿™æ€Žä¹ˆä¼šæ˜¯æ©™é¢˜å•Š æ³¨æ„ DP çš„åˆå€¼ dp[0] = 1 ï¼Œå› ä¸ºéœ€ç‰¹åˆ«è€ƒè™‘è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ã€Œä»Ž 0 å¼€å§‹ä¹°èœã€çš„æƒ…å†µã€‚ å¾ªçŽ¯ä¸­çš„ i è¡¨ç¤ºå·²ç»è€ƒè™‘åˆ°äº†å‰ i é“èœã€‚å¦‚æžœèƒ½ä¹°çš„èµ·ï¼Œå°±ç›´æŽ¥æŠŠ dp[j-a[i]] è½¬ç§»è¿‡æ¥ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¸å˜ã€‚ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;int dp[11000], n, m, a[110];int main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d", &a[i]); dp[0] = 1; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { for(int j=m; j>=a[i]; --j) { dp[j] += dp[j-a[i]]; } } printf("%d
", dp[m]); return 0;}# å®Œå…¨èƒŒåŒ… ä¸Žä¸Šé¢çš„ 01 èƒŒåŒ…é—®é¢˜å·®åˆ«ä¸å¤§ï¼Œåªæ˜¯å¤šäº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ¡ä»¶ï¼šæ¯ä¸ªç‰©å“å¯ä»¥å–æ— æ•°æ¬¡ã€‚ æ–¹æ³•å¾ˆç®€å•ï¼Œåªè¦ jjj ä»Žå‰å‘åŽæžšä¸¾å³å¯ã€‚è¿™æ ·åšå…¶å®žæ˜¯å˜ç›¸åˆ©ç”¨äº†å®ƒçš„åŽæ•ˆæ€§ï¼Œä½¿åŒä¸€ä¸ªç‰©å“å¯ä»¥è¢«å¤šæ¬¡å–åˆ°ã€‚ # P1616 ç–¯ç‹‚çš„é‡‡è¯ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;int t1, m, dp[int(1e7+10)], t[int(1e4+10)], v[int(1e4+10)];int main() { scanf("%d%d", &t1, &m); for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) scanf("%d%d", t+i, v+i); for(int i=1; i<=t1; ++i) { dp[i] = dp[i-1]; for(int j=1; j<=m; ++j) if(i-t[j]>=0) dp[i] = max(dp[i], dp[i-t[j]] + v[j]); } printf("%d
", dp[t1]); return 0;}# å¤šé‡èƒŒåŒ… è½¬æˆ 01 èƒŒåŒ…å¤„ç† é¦–å…ˆæ‰¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§çš„ kkk ä½¿å¾— t=âˆ‘i=0k2i(t<ci)t=\sum_{i=0}^{k}2^i(t < c_i)t=âˆ‘i=0kâ€‹2i(t<ciâ€‹)ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§çš„å°äºŽ cic_iciâ€‹ çš„äºŒçš„å„ä¸ªæ¬¡å¹‚å’Œã€‚è¿™æ ·ä¹‹åŽï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä¸é‡å¤ä¸”æœ‰é€‰æ‹©åœ°ä½¿ç”¨ 202^020 åˆ° 2k2^k2k æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºå‡º 1 åˆ° t æ‰€æœ‰çš„æ•°ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯å‰©ä¸‹çš„å‘¢ï¼Ÿæˆ‘ä»¬å°†å‰©ä¸‹çš„ ciâˆ’tc_i-tciâ€‹âˆ’t å•ç‹¬åˆ†æˆä¸€ä¸ªç‰©å“ï¼Œå› ä¸º 1 åˆ° t éƒ½å¯ä»¥è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæœ‰äº†è¿™ä¸ª ciâˆ’tc_i-tciâ€‹âˆ’t ç‰©å“ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥è¡¨ç¤ºå‡ºæ‰€æœ‰æ•°äº†ã€‚ ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼ŒæŠŠ 212121 åˆ†ä¸º [1,2,4,8,6][1,2,4,8,6][1,2,4,8,6]ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±å¯ä»¥ä»Žä¸­ä¸é‡å¤åœ°é€‰æ‹©æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºå‡º 1 åˆ° cic_iciâ€‹ çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ•°äº†ã€‚ # P1776 å®ç‰©ç­›é€‰ #include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int N = 110, M = 44000;int n, W, v[N], w[N], m[N], dp[M];int main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &W); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d%d%d", v+i, w+i, m+i); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { //1, 2, 4, 8, ... 2^k, m_i-2^(k+1)+1 int sum = 0; for(int j=0; sum + (1<<j) <= m[i]; ++j) { sum += (1<<j); for(int l=W; l>=w[i]*(1<<j); --l) dp[l] = max(dp[l], dp[l-w[i]*(1<<j)] + v[i]*(1<<j)); } for(int l=W; l>=w[i]*(m[i] - sum); --l) dp[l] = max(dp[l], dp[l-w[i]*(m[i] - sum)] + v[i]*(m[i] - sum)); } printf("%d
", dp[W]); return 0;}# P5020 [NOIP-2018-TG] è´§å¸ç³»ç»Ÿ æ„Ÿè§‰æ˜¯é“å¥½é¢˜ï¼Œä»Žéƒ¨åˆ†åˆ†ä¸€æ­¥ä¸€æ­¥ä¼˜åŒ–å°±å¯ä»¥æŽ¨å‡ºæ­£è§£çš„ã€‚ä¹ä¸€çœ‹å¯èƒ½ä»¥ä¸ºæ˜¯ä¸ªæ•°è®ºï¼Œå…¶å®žå¹¶ä¸æ˜¯ã€‚ # 80 åˆ†åšæ³•: è€ƒè™‘çˆ†æœï¼Œæžšä¸¾çŽ°æœ‰ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªæ•°èƒ½å¦è¢«å…¶ä»–å·²é€‰æ‹©çš„æ•°è¡¨ç¤ºå‡ºæ¥ã€‚è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥è´ªå¿ƒçš„æƒ³ï¼Œå¦‚æžœä¸€ä¸ªæ•°èƒ½è¢«å¦å¤–å‡ ä¸ªæ•°è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆåˆ é™¤å®ƒä¸€å®šæ˜¯æ›´ä¼˜è§£ã€‚ dfs() éƒ¨åˆ†å¯ä»¥æ¢æˆèƒŒåŒ…ï¼Œä¸è¿‡å¤æ‚åº¦çº§åˆ«æ˜¯å·®ä¸å¤šçš„ã€‚ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 110;bool us[N];int T, n, maxv, t, a[N];bool dfs(int s, int x, int p) { if(x > n or s > a[p]) return false; if(x == p or us[x]) return dfs(s, x+1, p); for(int i=0; i<=maxv/a[x]; ++i) { if(s+a[x]*i == a[p]) return true; bool f = dfs(s+a[x]*i, x+1, p); if(f) return true; } return false;}int main() { scanf("%d", &T); while(T--) { scanf("%d", &n); maxv = 0; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { scanf("%d", a+i); maxv = max(maxv, a[i]); } sort(a+1, a+n+1); t = unique(a+1, a+n+1) - (a+1); int ans = t; memset(us, false, sizeof us); for(int i=1; i<=t; ++i) { if(dfs(0,1,i)) { us[i] = true; --ans; } } printf("%d
", ans); } return 0;}# æ»¡åˆ†åšæ³•ï¼š å…¶å®žåœ¨ 80 åˆ†åŸºç¡€ä¸Šå†å¤šæƒ³ä¸€æ­¥å°±å¤Ÿäº†ï¼šæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸ç”¨æžšä¸¾æ¯ä¸ªæ•°çš„è¡¨ç¤ºæ³•æ¥åˆ¤æ–­å¯ä¸å¯ä»¥åˆ ã€‚ç›´æŽ¥å¯¹æ‰€æœ‰æ•° dpï¼Œå¦‚æžœä¸€ä¸ªæ•°èƒ½ç”¨ä¸€ç§ä»¥ä¸Šçš„æ–¹å¼è¡¨ç¤ºå‡ºæ¥ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±åˆ æŽ‰å®ƒã€‚æ˜¾ç„¶åˆ æŽ‰è¿™ä¸ªæ•°æ˜¯æ— åŽæ•ˆçš„ã€‚ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 110;bool us[N]; int dp[26000];int T, n, maxv, t, a[N];int main() { scanf("%d", &T); while(T--) { scanf("%d", &n); maxv = 0; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { scanf("%d", a+i); maxv = max(maxv, a[i]); } sort(a+1, a+n+1); t = unique(a+1, a+n+1) - (a+1); int ans = t; memset(dp, 0, sizeof dp); dp[0] = 1; for(int i=1; i<=t; ++i) { for(int j=a[i]; j<=maxv; ++j) { dp[j] += dp[j-a[i]]; } } for(int i=1; i<=t; ++i) { if(dp[a[i]] > 1) --ans; } printf("%d
", ans); } return 0;}# åˆ†ç»„èƒŒåŒ… åœ¨æžšä¸¾ä¸»ä»¶çš„å‰æä¸‹æžšä¸¾é™„ä»¶ã€‚ # P1064 é‡‘æ˜Žçš„é¢„ç®—æ–¹æ¡ˆ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;const int N = 33000, M = 65;typedef vector<int>::iterator IT;int n, m, p[M], v[M], dp[N];int g[M][2];vector<int> s;int main() { //freopen("P1064_5.in","r",stdin); scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) { int q; scanf("%d%d%d", &v[i], &p[i], &q); if(q == 0) s.push_back(i); else if(g[q][0]) g[q][1] = i; else g[q][0] = i; } for(IT it = s.begin(); it != s.end(); it++) { int i = *it; int a = g[i][0], b = g[i][1]; for(int j=n; j>=v[i]; --j) { dp[j] = max(dp[j], dp[j-v[i]] + v[i]*p[i]); if(j-v[i]-v[a] >= 0) dp[j] = max(dp[j], dp[j-v[i]-v[a]] + v[i]*p[i] + v[a]*p[a]); if(j-v[i]-v[b] >= 0) dp[j] = max(dp[j], dp[j-v[i]-v[b]] + v[i]*p[i] + v[b]*p[b]); if(j-v[i]-v[a]-v[b] >= 0) dp[j] = max(dp[j], dp[j-v[i]-v[a]-v[b]] + v[i]*p[i] + v[a]*p[a] + v[b]*p[b]); } } printf("%d
", dp[n]); return 0;}# è£…æ»¡èƒŒåŒ… ä¸€ç§ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µã€‚ èƒŒåŒ…ä¸ä¸€å®šè£…æ»¡æ—¶ï¼Œdp[j]dp[j]dp[j] è®°å½•çš„æ˜¯å‰ i ä»¶ç‰©å“æ”¾å…¥ç©ºé—´ä¸º j çš„èƒŒåŒ…ä¸­çš„æœ€å¤§ä»·å€¼ï¼Œè¦åœ¨ä¸€å¼€å§‹ï¼Œè®© dp[]dp[]dp[] ä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªå€¼ä¸º 0ã€‚ èƒŒåŒ…è£…æ»¡éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„ï¼š è¦æŠŠ f[j]f[j]f[j]ï¼ˆè¡¨ç¤ºåˆšå¥½è£…æ»¡çš„æœ€å¤§ä»·å€¼ï¼‰åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸º f[0] = 0; f[1..n] = -INF; è¿™æ ·å°±èƒ½ä½¿é‚£äº›èƒ½å¤Ÿæ°å¥½è£…æ»¡èƒŒåŒ…çš„ç‰©å“çš„å€¼ä¸ºæ­£æ•°ï¼Œè€Œé‚£äº›ä¸èƒ½æ°å¥½è£…æ»¡èƒŒåŒ…çš„ç‰©å“çš„å€¼å°±ä¸ºè´Ÿæ•°ï¼Œå°±å®¹æ˜“åŒºåˆ†äº†ã€‚ dp[n](èƒŒåŒ…æœ€å¤šæ‰¿é‡) == inf çš„è¯ï¼Œè¯´æ˜Žè£…ä¸æ»¡ï¼›å¦‚æžœè£…æ»¡çš„è¯ï¼Œ dp[n] å³ä¸ºæœ€é«˜ä»·å€¼ã€‚

# å¸¸è§çš„è´ªå¿ƒæŠ€å·§ è´§å¸ä½¿ç”¨é—®é¢˜ï¼š å°½å¯èƒ½å°‘ç”¨ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å…ˆæ‹¿é¢å€¼æœ€å¤§çš„ï¼Œä¾æ¬¡å¾€ä¸‹èµ°ï¼Œæœ€åŽæ‹¿å…‰äº†å³å¯ã€‚ åŒºé—´è°ƒåº¦é—®é¢˜ï¼š å·¥ä½œæ—¶é—´ä¸èƒ½é‡å ï¼Œåœ¨å¯é€‰å·¥ä½œä¸­ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡éƒ½é€‰å–ç»“æŸæ—¶é—´æœ€æ—©çš„ä½œä¸ºé€‰æ‹©ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿å·¥ä½œé‡æœ€å¤§ã€‚ # åˆ‡é¢˜å°æŠ€å·§ é€’å½’ï¼Œä»ŽåŽå‘å‰ é¢„å¤„ç† åˆ’åˆ†å­ç»“æž„ å•è°ƒé˜Ÿåˆ—ã€æ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£ èƒ½å‰ªçš„æžä¸€å®šè¦å‡ï¼èƒ½å‰ªçš„æžä¸€å®šè¦å‡ï¼èƒ½å‰ªçš„æžä¸€å®šè¦å‡ï¼ ä½†æ˜¯å‰ªæžåˆ«å‰ªæŒ‚äº†â€¦â€¦ # æ‰‹åŠ¨æ‰©æ ˆ ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶æŒ‡å®šå‚æ•° -Wl,--stack=sizesize æ˜¯æ ˆçš„å¤§å°ï¼Œå•ä½ä¸ºå­—èŠ‚ã€‚ # P5686 [CSP-SJX2019] å’Œç§¯å’Œ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;typedef long long ll;const int N = 500005, P = 1e9+7;int n;ll a[N], b[N], sa[N], sb[N], s[N], ssa[N], ssb[N];int main() { scanf("%d", &n); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%lld", a+i); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%lld", b+i); ll ans = 0, s = 0, sa = 0, sb = 0; for(int i=n; i>=1; --i) { sa += a[i]*(n+1-i)%P; sa%=P; sb += b[i]*(n+1-i)%P; sb%=P; ll del = ((a[i]*sb%P + b[i]*sa%P)%P + P - a[i]*b[i]%P*(n-i+1)%P)%P; s += del; s %= P; ans += s; ans %= P; } printf("%lld
", ans); return 0;}# U129453 ã€ŒEZEC-4.5ã€å åº§ä½ é¢˜è§£ #include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;typedef long long ll;map<ll, ll> f;ll n, k;ll dfs(ll n) { if(f[n]) return f[n]; if(n < 2*k+2) return f[n] = 1; return f[n] = dfs(n/2) + dfs(n-n/2);}int main() { scanf("%lld%lld", &n, &k); if(k == 0) printf("%lld
", n); else printf("%lld
", dfs(n)); return 0;}# P1182 æ•°åˆ—åˆ†æ®µ Section II #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;typedef long long ll;const int N = 1e5 + 10;int n, m; ll a[N];bool check(ll v) { ll sum = 0, pt = 0; int i=1; while(i<=n) { while(i<=n && sum + a[i] <= v) { sum += a[i]; ++i; } ++pt; if(pt > m) return false; sum = 0; } return true;}int main() { //freopen("p1182_1.in","r",stdin); scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); ll l=1, r=1e9; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { scanf("%lld", a+i); l = max(l, a[i]); } while(l < r-1) { ll mid = l+(r-l)/2; if(check(mid)) r=mid; else l=mid+1; } if(check(l)) printf("%lld
", l); else printf("%lld
", r); return 0;}# P2822 ç»„åˆæ•°é—®é¢˜ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 2200, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;int c[N][N], sum[N][N];int T, k;int main() { scanf("%d%d", &T, &k); c[0][0] = 1; for(int i=1; i<=2000; ++i) { c[i][0] = 1; for(int j=1; j<=i; ++j) { c[i][j] = c[i-1][j-1] + c[i-1][j]; c[i][j] %= k; } } for(int i=0; i<=2000; ++i) { for(int j=0; j<=i; ++j) { sum[i][j] = (c[i][j] == 0); } } for(int i=0; i<=2000; ++i) { for(int j=1; j<=2000; ++j) { sum[i][j] += sum[i][j-1]; } } for(int j=0; j<=2000; ++j) { for(int i=1; i<=2000; ++i) { sum[i][j] += sum[i-1][j]; } } while(T--) { int n, m; scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); printf("%d
", sum[n][min(n,m)]); } return 0;}# P1007 ç‹¬æœ¨æ¡¥ æ±‚æœ€å¤§æ—¶é—´æ—¶ï¼ŒæŠŠç¢°é¢æƒ³è±¡æˆäº¤æ¢èº«ä»½å³å¯ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;int l, n, p[5005];int main() { scanf("%d%d", &l, &n); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d", p+i); int ans1 = 0; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { ans1 = max(ans1, min(p[i], l+1-p[i])); } int ans2 = 0; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { ans2 = max(ans2, max(p[i], l+1-p[i])); } printf("%d %d
", ans1, ans2); return 0;}# P3958 å¥¶é…ª ç‰¹ç‚¹æ˜¯è‡ªåº•è‡³ä¸Šæ‰¾å‡ºé€šè·¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è”æƒ³è‡³æ£®æž—åˆå¹¶ã€‚ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;typedef long long LL;const int N = 1100;struct node { LL x, y, z;} a[N];bool cmp(node a, node b) { return (a.z < b.z);}bool tp[N], bt[N];int fa[N], T, n;LL h, r;int root(int x) { return fa[x]==x?x:root(fa[x]);}bool check(int i, int j) { LL dist = (a[i].x-a[j].x)*(a[i].x-a[j].x) + (a[i].y-a[j].y)*(a[i].y-a[j].y) + (a[i].z-a[j].z)*(a[i].z-a[j].z); return dist <= 4*r*r;}int main() { scanf("%d", &T); while(T--) { scanf("%d%lld%lld", &n, &h, &r); memset(bt, false, sizeof bt); memset(tp, false, sizeof tp); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%lld%lld%lld", &a[i].x, &a[i].y, &a[i].z); sort(a+1, a+n+1, cmp); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { if(a[i].z - r <= 0) bt[i] = true; if(a[i].z + r >= h) tp[i] = true; } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) fa[i] = i; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { for(int j=i+1; j<=n; ++j) { if(check(i, j)) { fa[root(i)] = root(j); } } } bool fla = false; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { if(bt[i] && tp[root(i)]) { fla = true; break; } } printf("%s", (fla ? "Yes
" : "No
")); } return 0;}

posts.text: # DFS ä¼—æ‰€å‘¨çŸ¥ï¼Œæœç´¢å’Œ DP æ˜¯ä¸åˆ†å®¶çš„ï¼Œå‡ ä¹Žæ‰€æœ‰çš„ DP éƒ½å¯ä»¥è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºæœç´¢ã€‚å½“æƒ³ä¸å‡ºæ­£è§£æ—¶ï¼ŒDFS ä¹Ÿæ˜¯éª—åˆ†çš„å¥½æ‰‹æ®µã€‚ ä¸»è¦çš„æœç´¢æ‰‹æ®µæœ‰ï¼š DFS/BFS çˆ†æœ åŒå‘ BFS å¯å‘å¼æœç´¢ï¼ˆåˆç§° A*ï¼‰ è¿­ä»£åŠ æ·±æœç´¢ IDA*ï¼ˆè¿­ä»£åŠ æ·± + å¯å‘å¼ï¼‰ è®°å¿†åŒ–æœç´¢ å‰ªæž é‡è¦ç¨‹åº¦ï¼š1,7,6 - 4,3 - 5,2ã€‚ ä¸‹é¢è¿™å‡ é“é¢˜éƒ½æ˜¯åŽ»å¹´å½“æ—¶ä¸ä¼šåšçš„ï¼Œç»“æžœä¸€å¹´è¿‡åŽ»äº†ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šï¼Œå‘œå‘œå‘œ # P3956 æ£‹ç›˜ NOIp 2017 æ™®åŠ æœç´¢è£¸é¢˜ æ˜¾ç„¶ä¸å¯ä»¥ç”¨ vis [] æ¥åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¼šæœåˆ°é‡å¤çš„çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘è®°å¿†åŒ–æœç´¢ã€‚ ç½‘ä¸Šçš„é¢˜è§£å¥½åƒéƒ½æ²¡æœ‰æ­£ç¡®æ€§è¯æ˜Žï¼Œå¯èƒ½è§‰å¾—å¤ªæ˜¾ç„¶äº†ï¼Ÿå¯æˆ‘å°±åœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¡äº†å¥½ä¹…å•Š /kk å¦‚æžœå½“å‰æ ¼å­æœ¬æ¥å°±æœ‰é¢œè‰²ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆé­”æ³•ä¸€å®šå¯ç”¨ å¦‚æžœå½“å‰æ ¼å­åŽŸæœ¬æ²¡æœ‰é¢œè‰²ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆåªè¦æœåˆ°è¿™ä¸ªæ ¼å­ï¼Œé­”æ³•å…¶å®žåªæœ‰ä¸€ç§æƒ…å†µå°±æ˜¯ä¸å¯ç”¨ è€Œä¸”è®°æœçš„æ—¶å€™æ³¨æ„å‰ªæžæ¡ä»¶ä¸€å®šè¦ ** å†™åˆ°ä¸Šç•Œï¼** æ¯”å¦‚ä¸‹é¢è¿™æ®µä»£ç ï¼Œ f >= mem[x][y] å¦‚æžœæ”¹æˆ f > mem[x][y] ï¼Œ100 ç›´æŽ¥å˜ 70â€¦â€¦ #include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int N = 110;int m, n, c[N][N], mem[N][N];int d[4][2] = <!--swigï¿¼0-->;int ans = 0x3f3f3f3f;void dfs(int x, int y, int f, int cc) { //f: ä»£ä»· //cc != -1 ä¸èƒ½ç”¨é­”æ³•ï¼Œæ­¤å¤„æ”¹æˆçš„é¢œè‰² //cc == -1 å¯ä»¥ if(f >= mem[x][y] || f >= mem[m][m]) return; mem[x][y] = f; if(x == m && y == m) return; for(int i=0; i<4; ++i) { int xx=x+d[i][0],yy=y+d[i][1]; if(xx<1||xx>m||yy<1||yy>m) continue; if(cc!=-1&&c[xx][yy]==cc||cc==-1&&c[xx][yy]==c[x][y]) { dfs(xx, yy, f, -1); } else if(cc!=-1&&c[xx][yy]!=cc&&c[xx][yy]!=-1||cc==-1&&c[xx][yy]!=c[x][y]&&c[xx][yy]!=-1) { dfs(xx, yy, f+1, -1); } else if(cc==-1&&c[xx][yy]==-1) { dfs(xx, yy, f+2, c[x][y]); } }}int main() { scanf("%d%d", &m, &n); memset(c, -1, sizeof c); memset(mem, 0x3f, sizeof mem); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { int x, y, cc; scanf("%d%d%d", &x, &y, &cc); c[x][y] = cc; } dfs(1, 1, 0, -1); printf("%d\n", mem[m][m] == 0x3f3f3f3f ? -1 : mem[m][m]); return 0;}# P3959 å®è— NOIp 2017 æé«˜ åŽ»å¹´åšçš„æ—¶å€™å°±è¿ž 70 åˆ†åšæ³•éƒ½ä¸ä¼šã€‚ä¸€å¹´è¿‡åŽ»äº†ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šï¼Œå‘œå‘œå‘œ ï¼ˆä¸‹é¢ä¸ºè‡ªå·±å¼€è„±ï¼‰ è¿™é“é¢˜çš„éƒ¨åˆ†åˆ†æ€æƒ³å…¶å®žè¿˜æŒºé‡è¦çš„ã€‚ æˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬çš„ DFS å°±æ˜¯åœ¨æ‰¾å‡ºå¾ˆå¤šå•æ¡è·¯å¾„çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼ŒèŽ·å¾—æœ€ä¼˜ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚å½¢å¼ä¹Ÿå¾ˆå›ºå®šï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬å½¢å¦‚ï¼š void/int dfs(int u, int sum, int cnt, ...)è€Œè¿™é“é¢˜ä¸ç„¶ã€‚ ä»Žæ ·ä¾‹äºŒå°±å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆåˆæ³•æ–¹æ¡ˆå‘ˆæ ‘å½¢ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯å•æ¡è·¯å¾„ã€‚ä¸€ä¸Šæ¥å¯èƒ½ä¼šæƒ³åˆ°ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å‡æŽ‰äº†ã€‚ã€ åä¾‹ï¼š è¿™å¼ å›¾ä»Ž 1 å·ç‚¹å¼€å§‹çš„ Prim ä¾¿æ˜¯é”™çš„ã€‚ å¦‚æžœè·‘ Primï¼Œä»Ž 1 å·ç‚¹å¼€å§‹çš„è¯ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¼šå…ˆè®¿é—® 2ï¼Œï¼ˆæ­¤æ—¶èŠ±è´¹ä¸º 1ï¼‰ï¼Œç„¶åŽæˆ‘ä»¬ä¼šè®¿é—® 3ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶èŠ±è´¹ä¸º 3 * 2ï¼Œç„¶åŽç”±äºŽåªæœ‰ 4 å·ç‚¹æœªè®¿é—®ï¼Œè¿™æ—¶ 3 å·çš„è®¿é—®é¡ºåºä¸º 3ï¼Œè®¿é—® 4 å·çš„ä»£ä»·æ˜¯ 3 * 100 = 300ï¼Œæ˜¾ç„¶è¿™ç§åšæ³•ä¸æ˜¯æœ€ä¼˜çš„ï¼Œæ­£ç¡®çš„ç­”æ¡ˆåº”è¯¥æ˜¯ 211ï¼ˆä»Ž 1 å·ç‚¹å¼€å§‹çš„æœ€å°èŠ±è´¹ä¸º 211ï¼‰ã€‚ è™½ç„¶ç›´æŽ¥è·‘ Prim æ˜¯é”™çš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ Prim çš„æ€æƒ³ä»ç„¶é‡è¦ï¼Œè¿™ä¸€æ€æƒ³ä¹Ÿåœ¨æœ€çŸ­è·¯ç­‰å¾ˆå¤šç®—æ³•ä¸­æœ‰åº”ç”¨ï¼šç”¨æ›´æ–°è¿‡çš„ç‚¹åŽ»æ›´æ–°å…¶ä»–ç‚¹ã€‚ æˆ‘ä»¬è®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ªä¸åŸºäºŽç‚¹çš„ dfs å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå‚æ•°åªéœ€ä¼ é€’ä»£ä»·ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡è¿­ä»£ï¼Œå…ˆæžšä¸¾è®¿é—®è¿‡çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œå†æžšä¸¾ä¸€ä¸ªæœªè®¿é—®ä¸”æœªå¼€é€šè·¯å¾„çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œæ¾å¼›ï¼Œå°†ä»£ä»·æŒç»­ä¼ é€’ä¸‹åŽ»ã€‚è®¡ç®—ä»£ä»·éœ€è¦è®°å½•ç‚¹çš„æ·±åº¦ï¼Œä¹Ÿè¦é€šè¿‡çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¼ é€’ä¸‹åŽ»ã€‚ ä»£ç ä¸é•¿ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸éš¾å†™ï¼Œè¯´æ˜¯ç™½ç»™ 70 åˆ†ï¼Œå…¶å®žæ€è·¯å¹¶ä¸å¥½æƒ³ï¼ˆè™½ç„¶æ¯”æ­£è§£ O(n2Ã—3n)O(n^2 \times 3^n)O(n2Ã—3n) çŠ¶åŽ‹å¥½å†™å¤šäº†ï¼‰ã€‚æ¯•ç«Ÿæ˜¯ç´«é¢˜å˜›ï¼Œåƒæˆ‘è¿™ç§èœé¸¡ä¹Ÿä¸æ‰“ç®— ACï¼Œèƒ½éª—å¤šå°‘æ˜¯å¤šå°‘ã€‚ æ€»çš„æ¥è¯´ï¼Œè¿™é“é¢˜çš„å…³é”®è¿˜æ˜¯åœ¨äºŽç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ï¼Œéœ€è¦è®¤çœŸçœ‹é¢˜ï¼Œç†Ÿç»ƒè¿ç”¨æ™®åŠç®—æ³•ï¼ˆ # Code: #include <cstdio>#include <cstring>const int INF = 0x7f7f7f7f;int min(int a, int b) { return a < b ? a : b; }int map[20][20];int dep[20], best, n, m, num;bool vis[20];void dfs(int x) { if(x >= best) return; // æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œçš„å‰ªæžï¼ if(num == 0) { best = x; return; } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { if(vis[i]) { for(int j=1; j<=n; ++j) { if(!vis[j] and map[i][j] < INF) { vis[j] = true; --num; dep[j] = dep[i] + 1; dfs(x + map[i][j] * dep[j]); vis[j] = false; ++num; } } } }}int main() { memset(map, 0x7f, sizeof map); scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) { int x, y, v; scanf("%d%d%d", &x, &y, &v); map[x][y] = map[y][x] = min(map[x][y], v); } best = INF; num = n; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { vis[i] = true; --num; dep[i] = 0; dfs(0); vis[i] = false; ++num; } printf("%d\n", best); return 0;}# çŠ¶åŽ‹ DP # å¸¸ç”¨æ“ä½œ è®¾å…¨é›†ä¸º xxx for(int y = x; y; y = (y-1) & x) ï¼šæžšä¸¾ x çš„æ¯ä¸ªå­é›† x^y ï¼šx é›†åˆä¸­åˆ¨åŽ» y x&y == y ï¼šy æ˜¯ x çš„å­é›† # P3052 [USACO12MAR]Cows in a Skyscraper G # P3959 å®è— å¯¹å°±æ˜¯åˆšæ‰é‚£é“é¢˜ã€‚ ä»¤ fj,i,Sf_{j,i,S}fj,i,Sâ€‹ è¡¨ç¤ºä»Žèµ·ç‚¹åˆ°å‡†å¤‡å‘å¤–å‘è¾¹çš„ç‚¹ iii çš„è·ç¦»ä¸º jjjï¼Œå‡†å¤‡è¦æŠŠé›†åˆ SSS ä¸­çš„ç‚¹æŒ–é€š è½¬ç§»æ—¶ï¼Œæžšä¸¾ä»ŽèŠ‚ç‚¹ iii æ‰“å‡ºçš„è¾¹ i->kï¼Œå†æžšä¸¾ä»Ž kkk è¦æ‰“é€šçš„å­é›† S2âŠ‚SS_2\subset SS2â€‹âŠ‚Sï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ fj,i,S=minâ¡kâˆˆS2âŠ‚S(d[i][k]âˆ—(j+1)+fj+1,k,S2âˆ’{k}+fj,i,Sâˆ’S2)f_{j, i, S} = \min_{k \in S_2 \subset S} (d[i][k] * (j + 1) + f_{j + 1, k, S_2 - \{k\}} + f_{j, i, S - S_2}) fj,i,Sâ€‹=kâˆˆS2â€‹âŠ‚Sminâ€‹(d[i][k]âˆ—(j+1)+fj+1,k,S2â€‹âˆ’{k}â€‹+fj,i,Sâˆ’S2â€‹â€‹) è½¬ç§»é¡ºåºä¸€å®šè¦æƒ³å¥½ã€‚ æœ€åŽå–æ‰€æœ‰ f0,i,Uâˆ’if_{0,i,U-{i}}f0,i,Uâˆ’iâ€‹ çš„æœ€å°å€¼å³å¯ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ UUU æ˜¯å…¨é›†ã€‚ æ ¸å¿ƒä»£ç  // é¢„å¤„ç†é›†åˆä¸­ 1 çš„ä¸ªæ•° for (int i = 1; i < mx; ++i) sz[i] = sz[i & (i - 1)] + 1; // é¢„å¤„ç† lowbit for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) mn[1 << i] = i; for (int i = 1; i < mx; ++i) mn[i] = mn[i & -i]; for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) f[n - 1][i][0] = 0; // åˆå€¼ for (int j = n - 2; j >= 0; --j) { // è·ç¦» for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) { // å‘è¾¹ç‚¹ f[j][i][0] = 0; // åˆå€¼ for (int S = 1; S < (1 << n); ++S) { if (((~S >> i) & 1) //i ä¸åœ¨é›†åˆ S é‡Œ && sz[S] <= n - j - 1) // ä¸ä¼šå¤šæŒ– for (int S2 = S; S2; S2 = (S2 - 1) & S) { //S çš„æ¯ä¸ªå­é›† int tmp = S2; for (int k = mn[tmp]; tmp; k = mn[tmp &= ~(1 << k)]) //S2 é‡Œçš„æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹ if (mp[i][k] ^ INF) // å­˜åœ¨å¾…æŒ–çš„è¾¹ f[j][i][S] = min(f[j][i][S], f[j + 1][k][S2 & ~(1 << k)] + f[j][i][S & ~S2] + mp[i][k] * (j + 1)); } } } } int ans = INF; for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) ans = std::min(ans, f[0][i][(mx - 1) & ~(1 << i)]);

# åŒºé—´ DP # P1880 [NOI1995] çŸ³å­åˆå¹¶ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 220;int ans, dp[N][N], n, a[N], s[N];int main() { scanf("%d", &n); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { scanf("%d", a+i); s[i] = s[i-1] + a[i]; } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { s[i+n] = s[i+n-1] + a[i]; } memset(dp, 0x3f, sizeof dp); for(int i=1; i<=2*n; ++i) dp[i][i] = 0; for(int l=2; l<=n; ++l) { for(int i=1, j=l; j<=2*n; ++i, ++j) { for(int k=i; k<j; ++k) { dp[i][j] = min(dp[i][j], dp[i][k] + dp[k+1][j] + s[j] - s[i-1]); } } } ans = 0x3f3f3f3f; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { //printf("%d ", dp[i][i+n-1]); ans = min(ans, dp[i][i+n-1]); } printf("%d
", ans); memset(dp, 0, sizeof dp); for(int i=1; i<=2*n; ++i) dp[i][i] = 0; for(int l=2; l<=n; ++l) { for(int i=1, j=l; j<=2*n; ++i, ++j) { for(int k=i; k<j; ++k) { dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i][k] + dp[k+1][j] + s[j] - s[i-1]); } } } ans = 0; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { ans = max(ans, dp[i][i+n-1]); } printf("%d
", ans); return 0;}# P1063 èƒ½é‡é¡¹é“¾ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 220;int n, h[N], t[N], dp[N][N];int main() { scanf("%d", &n); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { scanf("%d", &h[i]); h[i+n] = h[i]; } for(int i=1; i<2*n; ++i) t[i] = h[i+1]; for(int l=2; l<=n; ++l) { for(int i=1, j=l; j<=2*n; ++i, ++j) { for(int k=i; k<j; ++k) { dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i][k] + dp[k+1][j] + h[i] * t[k] * t[j]); } } } int ans = 0; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { ans = max(ans, dp[i][i+n-1]); } printf("%d
", ans); return 0;}# P3146 [USACO16OPEN]248 G #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;int n, dp[300][300], ans = 0;int main() { scanf("%d", &n); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { scanf("%d", &dp[i][i]); } for(int l=2; l<=n; ++l) { for(int i=1, j=l; j<=n; ++i, ++j){ for(int k=i; k<j; ++k) { if(dp[i][k] == dp[k+1][j]) dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i][k]+1); } ans = max(ans, dp[i][j]); } } printf("%d
", ans); return 0;}# æ ‘å½¢ DP æ ‘å½¢ DP ä¸‰å¤§é—®é¢˜ï¼šæ ‘çš„æœ€å¤§ç‹¬ç«‹é›† æ ‘çš„é‡å¿ƒ æ ‘çš„æœ€é•¿è·¯å¾„ # P1352 æ²¡æœ‰ä¸Šå¸çš„èˆžä¼š #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;typedef vector<int>::iterator IT;const int N = 6e3 + 10;int fa[N]; vector<int> g[N];int n, r[N];inline int fin() { for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) if(!fa[i]) return i;}int f[N][2];// 0/1void dfs(int u) { f[u][0] = 0; f[u][1] = r[u]; for(IT it = g[u].begin(); it != g[u].end(); ++it) { dfs(*it); f[u][0] += max(f[*it][0], f[*it][1]); f[u][1] += f[*it][0]; }}int main() { scanf("%d", &n); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d", r+i); for(int i=1; i<n; ++i) { int l, k; scanf("%d%d", &l, &k); fa[l] = k; g[k].push_back(l); } int rt = fin(); dfs(rt); printf("%d", max(f[rt][0], f[rt][1])); return 0;}# P2014 [CTSC1997] é€‰è¯¾ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;const int N = 330;vector<int> g[N];int n, m; int dp[N][N];void dfs(int u) { for(vector<int>::iterator it = g[u].begin(); it != g[u].end(); it++) { dfs(*it); for(int j=m+1; j>1; --j) { for(int k=0; k<j; ++k) dp[u][j] = max(dp[u][j], dp[*it][k] + dp[u][j-k]); } }}int main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { int k; scanf("%d%d", &k, &dp[i][1]); g[k].push_back(i); } dfs(0); printf("%d
", dp[0][m+1]); return 0;}

# å›¾è®º å›¾è®ºç®—æ³•ä¸€èˆ¬éƒ½æ˜¯æ‰åœ¨ä¸€èµ·çš„ï¼Œå¾ˆéš¾å•ç‹¬æŠŠç®—æ³•æ‹†å¼€è®²ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç›´æŽ¥ä¸Šé¢˜ç›®å§ã€‚åˆ†ç±»æ˜¯å¤§è‡´åˆ†çš„ï¼Œå…¶å®žæœ‰å¾ˆå¤šæ˜¯äº¤å‰çš„ã€‚ # äºŒå‰æ ‘ äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„éåŽ†æœ‰ä¸‰ç§ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºå‰åºéåŽ†ï¼Œä¸­åºéåŽ†å’ŒåŽåºéåŽ†ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ç»™å®šå…¶ä¸­çš„ä¸¤ç§éåŽ†èƒ½å¤Ÿæ±‚å‡ºå¦ä¸€ç§éåŽ† (å¿…é¡»å·²çŸ¥ä¸­åºéåŽ†)ã€‚ å‰åºéåŽ†ï¼šæŒ‰ æ ¹ å·¦ å³ çš„é¡ºåºè¿›è¡Œï¼› ä¸­åºéåŽ†ï¼šæŒ‰ å·¦ æ ¹ å³ çš„é¡ºåºè¿›è¡Œï¼› åŽåºéåŽ†ï¼šæŒ‰ å·¦ å³ æ ¹ çš„é¡ºåºè¿›è¡Œã€‚ # æœ€çŸ­è·¯ & ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ # ç®—æ³•å¤æ‚åº¦ å¤šæºæœ€çŸ­è·¯ Floydï¼šä¸¥æ ¼ O(n3)O(n^3)O(n3) å•æºæœ€çŸ­è·¯ Dijkstraï¼š æœ´ç´ ï¼šä¸¥æ ¼ O(n2)O(n^2)O(n2) ä¼˜å…ˆé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼šå‡æ‘Š O((e+n)logâ¡n)O((e+n) \log n)O((e+n)logn) Bellman-Fordï¼š æœ€å¤šæ¾å¼› nâˆ’1n-1nâˆ’1 æ¬¡ ä¸¥æ ¼ O(ne)O(ne)O(ne) SPFAï¼š å³é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¼˜åŒ– Bellman-Ford æœ€å O(ne)O(ne)O(ne)ï¼Œæœ€å¥½ O(1)O(1)O(1) # æ¿å­ å’•å’•å’• # å¦‚ä½•å¡æŽ‰ SPFA è§ https://www.zhihu.com/question/292283275/answer/484871888 # P1967 è´§è½¦è¿è¾“ æœ€å¤§ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ï¼Œç„¶åŽè·‘ LCA #include <cstdio>#include <cstring>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 1e4+10, M = 1e5+10, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;struct node { int id, u, v, w, next;} e[M], e1[M];int h[N], tot = 0, tot1 = 0, n, m;int fa[N][15], dep[N], dis[N][15];int vis[N];bool edg[M];void add(int u, int v, int w) { e1[tot1] = e[tot] = {tot, u, v, w, h[u]}; h[u] = tot++; tot1++; e[tot] = {tot, v, u, w, h[v]}; h[v] = tot++;}int bc[N];int root(int u) { return bc[u] == u ? u : bc[u] = root(bc[u]);}bool cmp(node a, node b) { return a.w > b.w;}void dfs(int u, int f, int vi) { vis[u] = vi; for(int i = h[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; if(v == f) continue; if(edg[i] or edg[i^1]) { dep[v] = dep[u] + 1; fa[v][0] = u; dis[v][0] = e[i].w; dfs(v, u, vi); } }}void lca(int x, int y) { if(dep[x] < dep[y]) swap(x, y); int ans = INF; int t = dep[x] - dep[y]; for(int i=14; i>=0; --i) { if(t >= (1<<i)) { ans = min(ans, dis[x][i]); x = fa[x][i]; t -= (1<<i); } } if(x == y) { printf("%d
", ans); return; } for(int i=14; i>=0; --i) { if(fa[x][i] != fa[y][i]) { ans = min(ans, dis[x][i]); ans = min(ans, dis[y][i]); x = fa[x][i]; y = fa[y][i]; } } //printf("lca:%d
", fa[x][0]); printf("%d
", min(ans, min(dis[x][0], dis[y][0])));}int main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); memset(h, -1, sizeof h); for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) { int u, v, w; scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &w); add(u, v, w); } sort(e1, e1+tot1, cmp); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) bc[i] = i; for(int i=0; i<tot1; ++i) { int u = e1[i].u, v = e1[i].v; int u1 = root(u), v1 = root(v); if(u1 != v1) { edg[e1[i].id] = true; bc[v1] = u1; } } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { if(bc[i] == i) { dfs(i, 0, i); for(int j=0; j<=14; ++j) { fa[i][j] = i; dis[i][j] = INF; } } } for(int i=1; i<=14; ++i) { for(int j=1; j<=n; ++j) { fa[j][i] = fa[fa[j][i-1]][i-1]; dis[j][i] = min(dis[j][i-1], dis[fa[j][i-1]][i-1]); } } int query; scanf("%d", &query); for(int i=1; i<=query; ++i) { int x, y; scanf("%d%d", &x, &y); if(vis[x] != vis[y]) { printf("-1
"); continue; } lca(x, y); } return 0;}# P1073 æœ€ä¼˜è´¸æ˜“ åˆ†å±‚å›¾ï¼Œæœ€çŸ­è·¯ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <limits.h>#include <iostream>#include <queue>#include <map>using namespace std;const int N = 330000, M = 1650000;struct node { int u, v, w, next; node() {} node(int _u, int _v, int _w, int _next): u(_u), v(_v), w(_w), next(_next) {}} e[M << 1];int h[N], tot = 0;inline void add(int u, int v, int w = 0) { e[tot] = node(u, v, w, h[u]); h[u] = tot++;}int n, m, w[N]; bool vis[N]; int dis[N];int main() { #ifdef DEBUG freopen("p1073_1.in", "r", stdin); #endif scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { scanf("%d", &w[i]); } memset(h, -1, sizeof h); for(int i=1, x, y, z; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d", &x, &y, &z); if(z == 1) add(x, y), add(x+n, y+n), add(x+2*n, y+2*n); else { add(x, y), add(x+n, y+n), add(x+2*n, y+2*n); swap(x, y); add(x, y), add(x+n, y+n), add(x+2*n, y+2*n); } } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { add(i+n, i, w[i]); add(i, i+2*n, -w[i]); } queue<int> q; memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof dis); q.push(n+1); vis[n+1] = true; dis[n+1] = 0; while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); vis[u] = false; for(int i=h[u]; i!=-1; i=e[i].next) { int v=e[i].v; if(dis[v] > dis[u] + e[i].w) { dis[v] = dis[u] + e[i].w; if(!vis[v]) { q.push(v); vis[v] = true; } } } } printf("%d
", -dis[n*3]); return 0;}# P1119 ç¾åŽé‡å»º å¾ˆé‡è¦çš„é¢˜ç›®ï¼Œè€ƒå¯Ÿäº† Floyd çš„æœ¬è´¨ã€‚ # Floyd ç”¨ dis[k][i][j]dis[k][i][j]dis[k][i][j] è¡¨ç¤º i å’Œ j ä¹‹é—´å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ç¼–å·ä¸º 1â€¦k1\dots k1â€¦k çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„ï¼Œæ˜¾ç„¶ï¼Œdis[0][i][j]dis[0][i][j]dis[0][i][j] å°±æ˜¯åŽŸå§‹é‚»æŽ¥çŸ©é˜µæ•°æ®ã€‚ çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼š dis[k][i][j]=min(dis[kâˆ’1][i][j],dis[kâˆ’1][i][k]+dis[kâˆ’1][k][j])dis[k][i][j]=min(dis[k-1][i][j],dis[k-1][i][k]+dis[k-1][k][j]) dis[k][i][j]=min(dis[kâˆ’1][i][j],dis[kâˆ’1][i][k]+dis[kâˆ’1][k][j]) Floyd çš„æœ¬è´¨å…¶å®žå°±æ˜¯ DPï¼Œåªä¸è¿‡æˆ‘ä»¬é€šå¸¸åšé¢˜æ—¶åˆ©ç”¨äº†æ•°æ®åªä¼šä½¿ç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§çš„åŽŸç†ï¼ŒæŠŠ dis å˜æˆæ»šåŠ¨æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå‡å°‘äº†ä¸€ç»´ï¼ŒèŠ‚çœç©ºé—´ã€‚ æ›´å¤šè¯·è§ https://www.cnblogs.com/fangwencai/p/4784914.htmlã€‚ // æå‰å°†é‚»æŽ¥çŸ©é˜µå­˜åœ¨ dis æ•°ç»„é‡Œï¼Œå…¶ä»–ä¸è¿žé€šçš„åœ°æ–¹åˆå§‹åŒ–æˆæ— ç©·å¤§for(int k=1; k<=n; ++k) // æžšä¸¾ä¸­é—´ç‚¹ for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) // æžšä¸¾èµ·ç‚¹ if(i != k) // èŠ‚çœæ—¶é—´ï¼Œå¦‚æžœä¸€æ ·å°±ä¸å¾€ä¸‹èµ° for(int j=1; j<=n; ++j) // æžšä¸¾ç»ˆç‚¹ if(i != j and j != k) // ç»§ç»­åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå¦‚æžœæœ‰ä¸€æ ·çš„å°±ä¸å¾€ä¸‹èµ° dis[i][j] = min(dis[i][j], dis[i][k] + dis[k][j]); // çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æ‰€è°“çš„æ¾å¼›æ“ä½œåªè¦æˆ‘ä»¬èƒ½å¤Ÿåˆ©ç”¨ DP ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œå°±èƒ½è§£å†³è®¸å¤šé—®é¢˜ å†å›žæ¥çœ‹è¿™é“é¢˜ï¼Œæ–‡ä¸­è¯´æ¯ä¸ªæ‘å­æ˜¯ä¸åŒæ—¶é—´ä¿®å¥½çš„ï¼Œè€Œæ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½æŒ‰é¡ºåºç»™å‡ºï¼Œè¿™ä¸å°±æ˜¯æ°å¥½ç›¸å½“äºŽ Floyd çš„ä¸­é—´ç‚¹å—ï¼Ÿæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥æŠŠ k è½® DP åˆ†å¼€åšï¼Œæ¯è¾“å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œå°±ç”¨è¿™ä¸ªç‚¹å½“ä¸­è½¬ç«™æŠŠæœ€çŸ­è·ç¦»æ›´æ–°ä¸€éï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è·‘ä¸€é DPã€‚ # Code: #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 220;int t[N];struct query { int id, x, y, t;} a[55000];int res[55000], n, m, dp[N][N];int main() { //freopen("P1119_2.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { scanf("%d", t+i); } t[n+1] = 0x3f3f3f3f; memset(dp, 0x3f, sizeof dp); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) dp[i][i] = 0; for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) { int u, v, w; scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &w); ++u, ++v; dp[u][v] = dp[v][u] = w; } int q; scanf("%d", &q); for(int i=1; i<=q; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d", &a[i].x, &a[i].y, &a[i].t); a[i].id = i; ++a[i].x, ++a[i].y; } int cnt = 1; for(; a[cnt].t < t[1]; ++cnt) { res[a[cnt].id] = -1; } for(int T=1; T<=n; ++T) { for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { for(int j=1; j<=n; ++j) { dp[i][j] = min(dp[i][j], dp[i][T] + dp[T][j]); } } while(1) { if(cnt > q) break; if(a[cnt].t >= t[T] and a[cnt].t < t[T+1]); else break; if(a[cnt].x > T or a[cnt].y > T or dp[a[cnt].x][a[cnt].y] == 0x3f3f3f3f) { res[a[cnt].id] = -1; } else { res[a[cnt].id] = dp[a[cnt].x][a[cnt].y]; } ++cnt; } } for(int i=1; i<=q; ++i) printf("%d
", res[i]); return 0;}# åˆ¤è´ŸçŽ¯ è½¬è‡ª @SingerCoderï¼Œ% lgh æ³¨æ„ä¸€å®šè¦åˆ¤å…¥é˜Ÿæ¬¡æ•°è€Œä¸æ˜¯æ¾å¼›æ¬¡æ•°ã€‚ hack åŽŸç†å¾ˆç®€å•ï¼šå¦‚æžœå­˜åœ¨é‡è¾¹å¯¼è‡´äº†å¤šæ¬¡æ¾å¼›ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¯¹æ¾å¼›æ¬¡æ•°çš„åˆ¤æ–­å°±ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿå½±å“ã€‚è§£å†³æ–¹å¼å°±æ˜¯åˆ¤å…¥é˜Ÿæ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œè™½ç„¶ç•¥æ…¢ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ›´ç¨³ã€‚ Update [2020.7.26]ï¼šåœ¨å†™å·®åˆ†çº¦æŸçš„æ—¶å€™æƒ³ç”¨ spfa åˆ¤æ— è§£ï¼Œç„¶åŽç»è¿‡ä¸€ç³»åˆ—çš„æ€è€ƒå°±æœ‰äº†ä¸‹é¢è¿™ç»„æ–°çš„ hack æ•°æ®ï¼š input: 1 4 6 1 2 -3 1 3 -2 1 4 -1 2 3 -6 2 4 -5 3 4 -4 output: NO æ³¨æ„è¿™ç»„ hack åªå¯¹ç”¨é“¾å¼å‰å‘æ˜Ÿï¼ˆè€Œéž vectorï¼‰å­˜è¾¹ä¸”åˆ¤çš„æ˜¯æ¾å¼›æ¬¡æ•°ï¼ˆè€Œéžå…¥é˜Ÿæ¬¡æ•°ï¼‰çš„æœ‰æ•ˆï¼Œè€Œä¸”è¯¥æ•°æ®æ— é‡è¾¹æ— è‡ªçŽ¯ï¼Œæ¯” discuss é‡Œé¢çš„é‚£ä¸ªæ•°æ®æ›´æœ‰è¯´æœåŠ›ã€‚ é¦–å…ˆ hack åŽŸç†å°±æ˜¯å¯¹ n å·èŠ‚ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œ n-1 è½®æ¾å¼›ï¼Œæ¯è½®éƒ½æœ‰ x(xâˆˆ[1,nâˆ’1])x( x \in [1,n-1])x(xâˆˆ[1,nâˆ’1]) æ¬¡æ¾å¼›ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±èƒ½äº§ç”Ÿ n2n^2n2 çº§åˆ«çš„æ¾å¼›æ¬¡æ•°ã€‚ ä½†æ˜¯åˆ¤å…¥é˜Ÿæ¬¡æ•°å°± hack ä¸æŽ‰äº†ï¼Œæ¯è½®çš„ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡æ¾å¼›ä¼šè®© n èŠ‚ç‚¹å…¥é˜Ÿï¼Œä½† n èŠ‚ç‚¹åªæœ‰åœ¨ä¸‹ä¸€è½®æ‰ä¼šå‡ºé˜Ÿï¼›å› æ­¤æœ¬è½®çš„å…¶ä½™æ‰€æœ‰æ¾å¼›å…¨éƒ¨æ— æ³•å¯¼è‡´å…¥é˜Ÿã€‚ # P3385 [æ¨¡æ¿] è´ŸçŽ¯ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 2e3 + 10, M = 6e3 + 10;struct node { int u, v, w, next;} e[M];int h[N], tot = 0;int T, n, m;inline void add(int u, int v, int w) { e[++tot] = {u, v, w, h[u]}; h[u] = tot;} int dis[N], vis[N];bool inq[N];inline void spfa() { queue<int> q; memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof dis); memset(vis, 0, sizeof vis); memset(inq, false, sizeof inq); dis[1] = 0; q.push(1); inq[1] = true; ++vis[1]; while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); inq[u] = false;//printf("%d
", u); for(int i = h[u]; i ; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; if(dis[v] > dis[u] + e[i].w) { dis[v] = dis[u] + e[i].w; if(!inq[v]) { inq[v] = true; ++vis[v]; if(vis[v] > n-1) { printf("YES
"); return; } q.push(v); } } } } printf("NO
");}int main() { //freopen("P3385_2.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d", &T); while(T--) { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); memset(h, 0, sizeof h); tot = 0; for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) { int u, v, w; scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &w); if(w >= 0) { add(u, v, w); add(v, u, w); } else add(u, v, w); //printf("%d ", i); } spfa(); } return 0;}# åŸºçŽ¯æ ‘ n ä¸ªç‚¹ n æ¡è¾¹ åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªçŽ¯ æžšä¸¾æ–­è¾¹ # P5022 [NOIp2018TG] æ—…è¡Œ

posts.text: # Hexoï¼šé…ç½® SSH å…¬é’¥éƒ¨ç½² # é…ç½® git ä½¿ç”¨ ssh å¯†é’¥ git æ”¯æŒ https å’Œ git ä¸¤ç§ä¼ è¾“åè®®ã€‚å…¶å®žä¸¤ç§æ–¹å¼éƒ½å¯ä»¥ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¦‚æžœä½¿ç”¨ https åè®®ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡ pullã€push éƒ½è¦è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ï¼ˆå¤§éƒ¨åˆ†ç”µè„‘ä¸Šï¼‰ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å»ºè®®ä½¿ç”¨ ssh å¯†é’¥å¯¹è®¤è¯ï¼Œå¯å®žçŽ°å…å¯†ä¸”æ›´åŠ å®‰å…¨ã€‚ä¸‹é¢å°†ä»‹ç» Hexo å¦‚ä½•é…ç½® SSH å…¬é’¥éƒ¨ç½²ã€‚ ç¤ºä¾‹åœ¨ Windows çŽ¯å¢ƒä¸‹ã€‚ # Step 1ï¼šç”Ÿæˆå¯†é’¥å¯¹ - è¿›å…¥ C:\ç”¨æˆ·\[ä½ çš„ç”¨æˆ·å]/.ssh æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œå³é”®å”¤å‡º PowerShell - è¾“å…¥ ssh-keygen ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸€ç›´æ•²å‡»å›žè½¦è‡³å¯†é’¥å›¾ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œå¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸­å¤šå‡ºäº†ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ï¼š id_rsa å’Œ id_rsa.pub å®žä¾‹ï¼š SerokSSR@Desktop-ABCDEFG ~\.ssh> ssh-keygen Generating public/private rsa key pair.Enter file in which to save the key (C:\Users\SerokSSR/.ssh/id_rsa): Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase): Enter same passphrase again: Your identification has been saved in C:\Users\SerokSSR/.ssh/id_rsa.Your public key has been saved in C:\Users\SerokSSR/.ssh/id_rsa.pub.The key fingerprint is:SHA256:fO7pVFqZ464nC8H6B3pTE8cwPx2mTM0G8KJt7Or2L8o SerokSSR@DESKTOP-ABCDEFGThe keys randomart image is:+---[RSA 2048]----+| ...+ || o.. * || .B.= . || o +..Bo. || S =o*. || ..*o= . || ...o=.. || .o+=+o. || +E*BBo |+----[SHA256]-----+# Step 2ï¼šé…ç½®è¿œç¨‹ä»“åº“çš„å…¬é’¥ - è®¿é—® GitHubï¼Œç‚¹å‡» å¤´åƒ -> Settings -> å·¦ä¾§ SSH and GPG keys -> å³ä¸Š New SSH key - æ‰“å¼€ä½ åˆšæ‰ç”Ÿæˆçš„ /.ssh/id_rsa.pub ï¼ŒæŠŠé‡Œé¢çš„å†…å®¹å…¨é€‰å¤åˆ¶åˆ° Key æ ä¸­ï¼ŒTitle æ å¯ä¸å¡« - ç‚¹å‡» Add SSH keyï¼Œå®Œæˆæ·»åŠ  # Step 3ï¼šéªŒè¯å¯†é’¥æ˜¯å¦ç”Ÿæ•ˆ æŽ§åˆ¶å°è¾“å…¥ ssh -T git@github.com ï¼Œå‡ºçŽ°å¦‚ä¸‹å›žå¤åˆ™å¯†é’¥å·²ç”Ÿæ•ˆã€‚ SerokSSR@DESKTOP-ABCDEFG ~\.ssh> ssh -T git@github.comHi SerokSSR! Youve successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.# Step 4ï¼šæ·»åŠ  SSH ä»“åº“ åœ¨ä½ çš„åšå®¢æ ¹ç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„ _config.yml ï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ° deploy é€‰é¡¹ï¼Œå°†ä½ ä»“åº“çš„ ssh é“¾æŽ¥æ·»åŠ è‡³æ­¤å¤„ã€‚ å®žä¾‹ï¼š deploy:- type: git repo: git@github.com:SerokSSR/snow.git branch: master# Step 5ï¼šé…ç½® Hexo éƒ¨ç½² ä¸ºäº†æ–¹ä¾¿æ¯æ¬¡éƒ¨ç½²ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨ä½ çš„åšå®¢æ ¹ç›®å½•ä¸‹æ–°å»º deploy.sh ï¼Œæ·»åŠ ä»¥ä¸‹å†…å®¹ï¼š #!echo "Start"hexo cleanhexo generatehexo deployecho "Finish"echo æŒ‰ä»»æ„é”®ç»§ç»­read -n 1ç„¶åŽæ¯æ¬¡éƒ¨ç½²å°±å¯ä»¥ç›´æŽ¥è¿è¡Œè¿™ä¸ªè„šæœ¬ï¼Œè€Œä¸ç”¨æ¯æ¬¡éƒ½è¦æ•²ä¸€é hexo cl&&hexo g&&hexo d äº†ã€‚

posts.text: # æ¶‰æ±Ÿ E åº§çš„å°½å¤´æ˜¯ä¸€æ‰‡çª—ã€‚å¥¹å–œæ¬¢ä¼åœ¨é‚£é‡Œçš„çª—æ£‚ä¸Šï¼Œå¾ˆå¤šä¸ªè¯¾é—´ã€‚çª—å¤–æ˜¯ä¸€å¹¢å¤©äº•ï¼›ä¸‰é¢çŽ¯æ¥¼ï¼Œå¤ä¸è§æ›¦ã€‚ scanf("%d", &n); for (i=0; i<n; ++i) scanf("%d", a+i); qsort(a, n, sizeof(int), cmp); for (i=0; i<n-1; ++i) printf("%d ", a[i]); printf("%d\n", a[n-1]); return 0;}# ä½¿ç”¨ PB_DS PB_DS ï¼Œåˆç§°å¹³æ¿ç”µè§†ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå†·é—¨ä½†åŠŸèƒ½æžä¸ºå¼ºå¤§çš„ GNU-cpp æ‰©å±•åº“ï¼Œä½†åœ¨ OI ä¸­ï¼ˆå°¤å…¶æ˜¯çœé€‰ä»¥ä¸‹ï¼‰æžå°‘ç”¨åˆ°ã€‚ è¯¥åº“ä¸­æä¾›äº†å¤§é‡æ•°æ®ç»“æž„ï¼ˆè™½ç„¶ä¸å¼€ O2 çš„è¯å‡ ä¹Žéƒ½ä¼š T æŽ‰ï¼‰ï¼Œä»¥æ ‘å½¢ç»“æž„ä¸ºä¸»ï¼Œæ‹¿å‡ºæ¥åŸºæœ¬ä¸ªä¸ªéƒ½å¯ä»¥æŽ’åº å †ï¼š ï¼ˆæœªå¼€ O2ï¼Œ 248ms/5.23MB ï¼‰ #include <bits/stdc++.h>#include <bits/extc++.h>using namespace std;using namespace __gnu_pbds;__gnu_pbds::priority_queue < int, greater<int>, pairing_heap_tag > q;int n;int main() { scanf("%d", &n); for(int i=0, a; i<n; ++i) scanf("%d", &a), q.push(a); for(int i=0; i<n; ++i) printf("%d ", q.top()), q.pop(); return 0;}ç”±äºŽ pb_ds ä¸­çš„ tree ç›¸å½“äºŽ set è€Œä¸æ˜¯ multiset ï¼Œå› æ­¤æ¯”æ‰‹å†™å¿«æŽ’è¿˜é•¿ï¼Œä¸å†å±•ç¤ºã€‚

posts.text: # ç½‘ç»œæµï¼šæœ€å¤§æµ # EK å¢žå¹¿è·¯æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯å¾ˆå¤šç½‘ç»œæµç®—æ³•çš„åŸºç¡€ã€‚å…¶æ€è·¯æ˜¯æ¯æ¬¡æ‰¾å‡ºä¸€æ¡ä»Žæºåˆ°æ±‡çš„èƒ½å¤Ÿå¢žåŠ æµçš„è·¯å¾„ï¼Œè°ƒæ•´æµå€¼å’Œæ®‹ç•™ç½‘ç»œ ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ²¡æœ‰å¢žå¹¿è·¯ä¸ºæ­¢ã€‚ EK ç®—æ³•å°±æ˜¯ä¸æ–­çš„æ‰¾æœ€çŸ­è·¯ï¼Œæ‰¾çš„æ–¹æ³•å°±æ˜¯æ¯æ¬¡æ‰¾ä¸€æ¡è¾¹æ•°æœ€å°‘çš„å¢žå¹¿ï¼ˆå³æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„å¢žå¹¿ï¼‰ã€‚ # æœ€å¤šè¦å¢žå¹¿å¤šå°‘æ¬¡ï¼Ÿ å¯ä»¥è¯æ˜Žï¼Œæœ€å¤š O (VE)â€‹ æ¬¡å¢žå¹¿ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è¾¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§æµã€‚ # å¦‚ä½•æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€æ¡å¢žå¹¿è·¯ï¼Ÿ å…ˆæ˜Žç¡®ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯å¢žå¹¿è·¯ã€‚å¢žå¹¿è·¯æ˜¯ä¸€æ¡ä»Ž s åˆ° t çš„è·¯å¾„ï¼Œè·¯å¾„ä¸Šæ¯æ¡è¾¹æ®‹ç•™å®¹é‡éƒ½ä¸ºæ­£ã€‚æŠŠæ®‹ç•™å®¹é‡ä¸ºæ­£çš„è¾¹è®¾ä¸ºå¯è¡Œçš„è¾¹ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å¯ä»¥ç”¨ç®€å•çš„ BFS å¾—åˆ°è¾¹æ•°æœ€å°‘çš„å¢žå¹¿è·¯ã€‚ # å¦‚ä½•å¢žå¹¿ï¼Ÿ BFS å¾—åˆ°å¢žå¹¿è·¯ä¹‹åŽï¼Œè¿™æ¡å¢žå¹¿è·¯èƒ½å¤Ÿå¢žå¹¿çš„æµå€¼ï¼Œæ˜¯è·¯å¾„ä¸Šæœ€å°æ®‹ç•™å®¹é‡è¾¹å†³å®šçš„ã€‚æŠŠè¿™ä¸ªæœ€å°æ®‹ç•™å®¹é‡ MinCap å€¼åŠ åˆ°æœ€å¤§æµå€¼ Flow ä¸Šï¼ŒåŒæ—¶è·¯å¾„ä¸Šæ¯æ¡è¾¹çš„æ®‹ç•™å®¹é‡å€¼å‡åŽ» MinCapï¼›æœ€åŽï¼Œè·¯å¾„ä¸Šæ¯æ¡è¾¹çš„åå‘è¾¹æ®‹ç•™å®¹é‡å€¼è¦åŠ ä¸Š MinCapã€‚è¿™æ ·æ¯æ¬¡å¢žå¹¿çš„å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º O(E)ï¼Œæ€»å¤æ‚åº¦å°±æ˜¯ O(VE2)ã€‚äº‹å®žä¸Šï¼Œå¤§å¤šæ•°ç½‘ç»œçš„å¢žå¹¿æ¬¡æ•°å¾ˆå°‘ï¼Œå› æ­¤ EK ç®—æ³•èƒ½å¤„ç†ç»å¤§å¤šæ•°é—®é¢˜ã€‚ # ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆå¢žå¹¿è·¯å¾„ä¸Šæ¯æ¡è¾¹çš„åå‘è¾¹æ®‹ç•™å®¹é‡å€¼è¦åŠ ä¸Š MinCapï¼Ÿ æ®‹ç•™ç½‘ç»œ = å®¹é‡ç½‘ç»œ - æµé‡ç½‘ç»œ å®¹é‡ç½‘ç»œä¸æ”¹å˜çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œç”±äºŽå¢žå¹¿å¥½æ¯”ç»™å¢žå¹¿è·¯ä¸Šé€šäº†ä¸€æ¡æµï¼Œè·¯å¾„ä¸Šæ‰€æœ‰è¾¹æµé‡åŠ  MinCap ä¹‹åŽï¼Œç›¸å¯¹åº”çš„æ®‹ç•™ç½‘ç»œå°±å‘ç”Ÿç›¸åçš„æ”¹å˜ã€‚å› ä¸ºå»ºç«‹äº†åå‘è¾¹ï¼Œå¦‚æžœè¿™æ¡è·¯å¾„ä¸æ˜¯æœ€ç†æƒ³çš„å°±ä¼šå›žæµï¼Œé¿å…äº†è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µã€‚è¿™æ˜¯ç½‘ç»œæµé‡Œå¾ˆé‡è¦çš„ä¸€ç‚¹ã€‚ # å›¾ä¾‹ # Dinic # BFS åˆ†å±‚ ä¸Ž EK ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä»è¦é€šè¿‡ bfs æ¥åˆ¤æ–­å›¾ä¸­æ˜¯å¦è¿˜å­˜åœ¨å¢žå¹¿è·¯ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ Dinic ç®—æ³•é‡Œçš„ bfs ç•¥æœ‰ä¸åŒã€‚è¿™æ¬¡ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸ç”¨è®°å½•è·¯å¾„ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ç»™æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹åˆ†å±‚ï¼Œå¯¹äºŽä»»æ„ç‚¹ iï¼Œä»Ž s åˆ° i æ¯å¤šèµ°è¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œå°±è®©å±‚æ•°å¤š 1ã€‚ä¸€æ¬¡åˆ†å±‚åŽå¯ä»¥æ‰¾åˆ°å¤šæ¡å¢žå¹¿è·¯ï¼Œä»Žè€Œæé«˜æ•ˆçŽ‡ã€‚ åˆ†å®Œå±‚æ•ˆæžœæ˜¯è¿™æ ·çš„ï¼šï¼ˆè“è‰²çš„æ•°å­—æ˜¯æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹å±‚æ•°ï¼‰ # DFS å¢žå¹¿ æœ‰äº†æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹çš„å±‚æ•°ç¼–å·ï¼Œå¯¹ä»»æ„ç‚¹ u åˆ°ç‚¹ d çš„è·¯å¾„å¦‚æžœæœ‰ dep[d]=dep[u]+1dep[d]=dep[u]+1dep[d]=dep[u]+1ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å¯ä»¥åˆ¤æ–­è¯¥è·¯å¾„åœ¨å¢žå¹¿è·¯ä¸Šã€‚ æ¯”å¦‚è¯´ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬é¦–å…ˆæ‰¾ s->1->4->tï¼š ç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡ï¼Œs->1->5->tï¼š ç¬¬ä¸‰æ¬¡ï¼Œs->1->3->tï¼š è¿˜æœ‰ç¬¬å››æ¡ï¼Œs->2->3->tï¼š PSï¼šDinic åœ¨è·‘äºŒåˆ†å›¾åŒ¹é…æ—¶æ¯”åŒˆç‰™åˆ©å¿«å¾ˆå¤šã€‚ # P3376 ç½‘ç»œæœ€å¤§æµ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 11000, M = 110000;const int INF = 0x7fffffff;struct node { int u, v, w, next;} e[M << 1];int cur[N], h[N], tot;int dfn[N], ans, n, m, s, t;void add(int u, int v, int w) { e[tot] = node({u, v, w, h[u]}); cur[u] = h[u] = tot++;}bool bfs() { memcpy(cur, h, sizeof cur); memset(dfn, 0, sizeof dfn); queue<int> q; dfn[s] = 1; q.push(s); while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); for(int i = h[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; if(e[i].w and !dfn[v]) { dfn[v] = dfn[u] + 1; q.push(v); if(v == t) return true; } } } return false;}int dfs(int u, int low) { if(u == t) return low; int w = low; for(int i = cur[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; cur[u] = i; if(e[i].w and dfn[v] == dfn[u] + 1) { int f = dfs(v, min(w, e[i].w)); if(f == 0) dfn[v] = 0; e[i].w -= f; e[i^1].w += f; w -= f; if(!w) break; } } return low - w;}void dinic() { int flow; while(bfs()) while(flow = dfs(s, INF)) ans += flow;}int main() { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &n, &m, &s, &t); memset(h, -1, sizeof h); for(int i=1, u, v, w; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &w); add(u, v, w); add(v, u, 0); } dinic(); printf("%d\n", ans); return 0;}

Code #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 110, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;char tools[10000];class node { public: int u, v, w, next;} e[N * N];int head[N], cur[N], tot = 0;void add(int u, int v, int w) { e[tot] = {u, v, w, head[u]}; head[u] = tot++; e[tot] = {v, u, 0, head[v]}; head[v] = tot++;}int h[N], n, m, s, t;bool bfs() { memset(h, 0, sizeof h); memcpy(cur, head, sizeof cur); queue<int> q; q.push(s); h[s] = 1; while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); for(int i = head[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; if(e[i].w and h[v] == 0) { h[v] = h[u] + 1; if(v == t) return true; q.push(v); } } } return false;}int dfs(int u, int low) { if(u == t) return low; int w = low; for(int i = cur[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next, cur[u] = i) { int v = e[i].v; if(e[i].w and h[v] == h[u] + 1) { int f = dfs(v, min(w, e[i].w)); if(f == 0) h[v] = 0; e[i].w -= f; e[i^1].w += f; w -= f; if(w == 0) break; } } return low - w;}int maxflow = 0, sum = 0;void dinic() { int flow; while(bfs()) while(flow = dfs(s, INF)) maxflow += flow;}int main() { //freopen("shut2.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d%d", &m, &n); memset(head, -1, sizeof head); s = 0, t = n+m+1; for(int i=1, w; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d", &w); add(s, i, w); sum += w; memset(tools, '\0', sizeof tools); cin.getline(tools, 10000); int ulen = 0, tool; while(sscanf(tools + ulen, "%d", &tool) == 1) { add(i, tool + m, INF); if(tool == 0) ulen++; else { while(tool) { tool /= 10; ulen++; } } ulen++; } } for(int i=1, w; i<=n; ++i) { scanf("%d", &w); add(i+m, t, w); } dinic(); for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) if(h[i]) printf("%d ", i); printf("
"); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) if(h[i+m]) printf("%d ", i); printf("
"); printf("%d
", sum - maxflow); return 0;}# å…¨å±€æœ€å°å‰² æš‚æ—¶ç•™å‘ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å…ˆå‚è€ƒè¿™ç¯‡æ–‡ç« ã€‚ # Code (POJ 2914, æœªä¼˜åŒ–ç‰ˆ) #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 550;int g[N][N];int dis[N];bool flag[N], vis[N];int n, m, s, t;int main() { while(scanf("%d%d", &n, &m) != EOF) { memset(g, 0, sizeof g); for(int i=1, a, b, c; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d", &a, &b, &c); ++a, ++b; g[a][b] += c; g[b][a] += c; } int ans = 0x3f3f3f3f; memset(flag, false, sizeof flag); for(int o=1; o<n; ++o) { s = t = 0; memset(vis, false, sizeof vis); memset(dis, 0, sizeof dis); for(int p=1; p<=n; ++p) { int v = -1; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) if(!flag[i] and !vis[i] and (v == -1 or dis[v] < dis[i])) v = i; if(v == -1) break; vis[v] = true; s=t, t=v; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) if(!flag[i] and !vis[i]) dis[i] += g[t][i]; } flag[t] = true; ans = min(ans, dis[t]); if(ans == 0) break; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { if(flag[i]) continue; g[s][i] += g[t][i]; g[i][s] += g[i][t]; } } printf("%d
", ans); } return 0;}

# CF387D # é¢˜æ„åˆ†æž æ“ä½œæœ€å°‘çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œæž„æˆæœ‰è¶£å›¾ï¼Œæ³¨æ„æ— é‡è¾¹ï¼Œæœ‰å‘è¾¹ã€‚ æ“ä½œåˆ†ä¸ºåŠ è¾¹å’Œåˆ è¾¹ã€‚ æœ‰è¶£å›¾å®šä¹‰ æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªä¸­å¿ƒï¼Œæ»¡è¶³æ­¤ç‚¹æœ‰è‡ªçŽ¯ï¼Œä¸”ä¸Žå…¶ä»–ç»“ç‚¹æœ‰åŒå‘è¾¹ã€‚ é™¤ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹å¤–çš„ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œæ»¡è¶³å‡ºåº¦ = å…¥åº¦ = 2ã€‚ # ç®—æ³•åˆ†æž 1ã€ä»”ç»†åˆ†æžæœ‰è¶£å›¾çš„å®šä¹‰ï¼Œå‘çŽ°å¦‚ä¸‹æ€§è´¨ï¼š ä¸­å¿ƒçš„è¾¹æ•°ä¸º (nâˆ’1)Ã—2+1(n-1)	imes 2+1(nâˆ’1)Ã—2+1ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å®ƒä¸Žå…¶ä»–ç»“ç‚¹è¦æœ‰åŒå‘è¾¹å†åŠ è‡ªå·±çš„ä¸€ä¸ªè‡ªçŽ¯ï¼Œæ— é‡è¾¹æ‰€ä»¥æž„é€ ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹æ—¶ä¸å¯èƒ½åšåˆ é™¤æ“ä½œï¼Œåªèƒ½åŠ è¾¹æˆ–ä¸æ“ä½œã€‚ å…¶ä»–ç»“ç‚¹çš„å‡ºå…¥åº¦ä¸º 2ï¼ŒæŽ’é™¤æŽ‰ä¸Žä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹è¿žæŽ¥çš„åŒå‘è¾¹ï¼Œå…¶ç‚¹çš„åº¦ä¸€å®šä¸ºä¸€è¿›ä¸€å‡ºã€‚ 2ã€å¦‚ä½•åˆ¤æ–­ç»“ç‚¹çš„åº¦æ»¡è¶³ä¸€è¿›ä¸€å‡ºã€‚ å›¾ä¸€ï¼Œå›¾äºŒéƒ½æ˜¯æ»¡è¶³ç»“ç‚¹åº¦ä¸€è¿›ä¸€å‡ºã€‚æ‰€ä»¥ nnn ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹éœ€è¦ nnn æ¡ç›¸è¿žè¾¹ï¼ˆé¦–å°¾ï¼‰ã€‚ å›¾ä¸‰ä¸æ»¡è¶³ï¼Œåªæœ‰ä¸¤æ¡ç›¸è¿žè¾¹ (e1,e2)(e_1,e_2)(e1â€‹,e2â€‹) æˆ–è€…é€‰æ‹© (e1,e3)(e_1,e_3)(e1â€‹,e3â€‹) å³æœ‰ç”¨è¾¹ï¼Œè¿˜éœ€è¦æ·»åŠ  nâˆ’2n-2nâˆ’2 è¾¹æœ‰ç”¨è¾¹ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶è¿˜è¦å‡æŽ‰ 1 æ¡è¾¹ï¼Œå³æ€»è¾¹æ•°å‡åŽ»æœ‰ç”¨è¾¹ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¦åˆ é™¤çš„æ— ç”¨è¾¹ã€‚ æ–¹æ³• 1ï¼šæ‹†ç‚¹ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹æ‹†ä¸ºè¿›ç‚¹å’Œå‡ºç‚¹ï¼Œå»ºç«‹äºŒåˆ†å›¾ã€‚ â€‹ å·¦è¾¹çš„ç‚¹æ±‚åŒ¹é…ï¼Œæœ€å¤§åŒ¹é…å°±æ˜¯æœ‰ç”¨çš„è¾¹ã€‚ æ–¹æ³• 2ï¼šç›´æŽ¥å°†å›¾çœ‹æˆäºŒåˆ†å›¾ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨æœ‰å‘è¾¹æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹éƒ½æ±‚åŒ¹é…ã€‚ 3ã€æžšä¸¾æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹åšä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹ã€‚ ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹ Vï¼Œè®¡ç®—ç»´æŠ¤ä¸­å¿ƒéœ€è¦çš„è¾¹ (nâˆ’1)Ã—2+1âˆ’âˆ‘(n-1)	imes 2+1-\sum(nâˆ’1)Ã—2+1âˆ’âˆ‘ åˆ é™¤ V ç‚¹ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯åŒ…å«ç›¸åº”çš„è¾¹ å‰©ä¸‹çš„å›¾ï¼Œè®¡ç®—æœ€å¤§åŒ¹é…ï¼Œæ»¡è¶³ä¸€è¿›ä¸€å‡ºçš„è¾¹æ•°éœ€è¦çš„æ“ä½œï¼ˆæ·»åŠ è¾¹ + åˆ é™¤è¾¹ï¼‰ã€‚ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <limits.h>#include <vector>#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 550, INF = INT_MAX;vector<int> g[N];int c, n, m;int tag = 0, vis[N], match[N];bool mp[N][N];bool dfs(int u) { for(int i = 0; i < g[u].size(); ++i) { int v = g[u][i]; if(v == c) continue; if(vis[v] == tag) continue; vis[v] = tag; if(match[v] == 0 or dfs(match[v])) { match[v] = u; return true; } } return false;}int best = INF;int main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); int sum0 = 0; for(int i=1, u, v; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &u, &v); g[u].push_back(v); mp[u][v] = true; ++sum0; } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { memset(match, 0, sizeof match); c = i; int ans = 0; int sum1 = 0; for(int j=1; j<=n; ++j) { if(j == c) { if(mp[c][c]) ++sum1; continue; } if(mp[j][c]) ++sum1; if(mp[c][j]) ++sum1; } ans += 2*(n-1) + 1 - sum1; //printf("ans1 = %d
", ans); //printf("sum1 = %d
", sum1); int sum2 = 0; for(int j=1; j<=n; ++j) { ++tag; if(j == c) continue; if(dfs(j)) ++sum2; } ans += sum0 - sum1 - sum2 + n-1 - sum2; best = min(best, ans); //printf("ans2 = %d
", ans); //printf("sum2 = %d
", sum2); } printf("%d
", best); return 0;}

# åŒ¹é…ï¼šæ¨¡æ¿ # UOJ78 äºŒåˆ†å›¾æœ€å¤§åŒ¹é…ï¼ˆDFS - KMï¼‰ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 550;int match[N], g[N][N], vis[N], link[N];int n, m, e, tag, ans = 0;bool dfs(int u) { for(int v=1; v<=m; ++v) { if(!g[u][v] or vis[v] == tag) continue; vis[v] = tag; if(!match[v] or dfs(match[v])) { match[v] = u; return true; } } return false;}int main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &e); for(int i=1, u, v; i<=e; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &u, &v); g[u][v] = true; } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { tag = i; if(dfs(i)) ++ans; } printf("%d
", ans); for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) link[match[i]] = i; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) printf("%d ", link[i]); return 0;}# UOJ79 ä¸€èˆ¬å›¾æœ€å¤§åŒ¹é…ï¼ˆå¸¦èŠ±æ ‘ï¼‰ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 550;int fa[N], match[N], pre[N], vis[N];int tag = 0, n, m, ans = 0;int flag[N];bool g[N][N];queue<int> q;void clear(queue<int> &q) { queue<int> empty; swap(q, empty);}int belong(int u) { return fa[u] == u ? u : fa[u] = belong(fa[u]);}void path(int u) { while(u) { int v = match[pre[u]]; match[u] = pre[u]; match[pre[u]] = u; u = v; }}int lca(int u, int v) { ++tag; u = belong(u); v = belong(v); while(vis[u] != tag) { vis[u] = tag; u = belong(pre[match[u]]); if(v) swap(u, v); } return u;}void connect(int u, int v, int root) { while(belong(u) != root) { pre[u] = v; v = match[u]; if(flag[v] == 2) { q.push(v); flag[v] = 1; } if(belong(u) == u) fa[u] = root; if(belong(v) == v) fa[v] = root; u = pre[v]; }}bool bfs(int u) { memset(flag, 0, sizeof flag); memset(pre, 0, sizeof pre); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) fa[i] = i; clear(q); q.push(u); flag[u] = 1; while(!q.empty()) { u = q.front(); q.pop(); for(int v=1; v<=n; ++v) { if(!g[u][v]) continue; if(flag[v] == 0) { pre[v] = u; if(match[v] == 0) { path(v); return true; } q.push(match[v]); flag[v] = 2; flag[match[v]] = 1; } else { if(flag[v] == 2) continue; if(belong(u) == belong(v)) continue; int root = lca(u, v); connect(u, v, root); connect(v, u, root); } } } return false;}int main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(int i=1, u, v; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &u, &v); g[u][v] = g[v][u] = true; } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) if(match[i] == 0 and bfs(i)) ++ans; printf("%d
", ans); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) printf("%d ", match[i]); return 0;}# UOJ80 äºŒåˆ†å›¾æœ€å¤§æƒåŒ¹é…ï¼ˆBFS - KMï¼‰ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;typedef long long LL;const int N = 440;const LL INF = 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;bool vis[N];int pre[N], link[N], res[N];int n, m, e;LL g[N][N], lx[N], ly[N], d[N], ans = 0;void bfs(int k) { int x, y = 0; LL min1 = INF, delta; memset(vis, false, sizeof vis); memset(pre, 0, sizeof pre); memset(d, 0x3f, sizeof d); link[y] = k; do { x = link[y], delta = INF, vis[y] = true; for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) { if(!vis[i]) { if(d[i] > lx[x] + ly[i] - g[x][i]) { d[i] = lx[x] + ly[i] - g[x][i]; pre[i] = y; } if(delta > d[i]) delta = d[i], min1 = i; } } for(int i=0; i<=m; ++i) if(vis[i]) lx[link[i]] -= delta, ly[i] += delta; else d[i] -= delta; y = min1; } while(link[y]); while(y) link[y] = link[pre[y]], y = pre[y];}int main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &e); m = max(n, m); for(int i=1; i<=e; ++i) { int u, v; LL w; scanf("%d%d%lld", &u, &v, &w); g[u][v] = w; lx[u] = max(lx[u], w); } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) bfs(i); for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) { if(!g[link[i]][i]) continue; ans += g[link[i]][i]; res[link[i]] = i; } printf("%lld
", ans); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) printf("%d ", res[i]); return 0;}

ä¸€å¤©ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªå¥³å­©é—¯å…¥äº†è¿™é‡Œã€‚ä¸€é˜µå’Œç…¦çš„é‡‘å…‰é¡¿æ—¶ç¬¼ç½©äº†å¥¹ï¼›ä¿„è€Œæ•£åŽ»ï¼Œå››ä¸‹æ— ç—•ã€‚ â€”â€” ä½†ä¸€åˆ‡ç»ˆåˆé‡å½’äº†å¹³é™ã€‚å”¯ä¸€ä¸åŒçš„æ˜¯ç”·å­©è¿›å…¥çš„é‚£åº§æ®¿å ‚ï¼Œè’™ä¸Šäº†é›ªä¸€èˆ¬çš„ç™½è‰²ï¼Œç™½å¾—ç¼ç—›äº†åŒçœ¼ â€”â€” æ®¿ä¸­å¤®ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªç”·å­©æ—è¾¹èººç€ä¸€ä¸ªå¥³å­©ã€‚åœ¨æ¸æ¸æ¨¡ç³Šçš„è§†é‡Žé‡Œï¼Œä»–ä»¬ç«™èµ·äº†èº«ï¼Œå‘æ²¼åº•çš„æ·±å¤„èµ°åŽ»ã€‚çªç„¶åœ°ï¼Œä¸€åº§ä¸€åº§çš„å®«æ®¿è½°ç„¶å€’ä¸‹ï¼Œæ³ç„¶æ— è¸ªï¼Œè¿žç“¦ç ¾éƒ½æµ¸æ²¡åœ¨å¤•é˜³é‡Œã€‚ ä»–ä»¬çš„é¢å‰æ˜¯ä¸€ç‰‡æ°´åŽŸã€‚ â€œæ²¡æœ‰å†å‘å‰çš„è·¯äº†å‘¢ï¼Œâ€ ç”·å­©é“ã€‚ â€œé‚£â‹¯â‹¯è¦ä¸å°±åœ¨è¿™é‡Œï¼Ÿâ€ å¥³å­©é—®é“ã€‚ ç”·å­©æ²¡æœ‰å›žç­”ã€‚ç©ºæ— ä¸€ç‰©çš„æµ·é¢ä¸Šï¼Œåå°„ç€å¤ªé˜³çš„å…‰è¾‰ã€‚ â€œè¿™é‡Œâ‹¯â‹¯æ²¡æœ‰æˆ‘èƒ½å›žåŽ»çš„åœ°æ–¹äº†ã€‚â€ å¥³å­©çš„å¿ƒå¾®å¾®ä¸€é¢¤ã€‚ é»‘äº‘åŽ‹äº†ä¸‹æ¥ã€‚ç”·å­©çœ‹å‘å¥¹çš„çœ¼ç›ï¼›é‚£åŒæ¹›è“çš„å¤©ç©ºé‡Œï¼Œåƒæ˜¯æœ‰ä¸¤æŸæ™¶èŽ¹çš„æ³ªåœ¨ç‡ƒçƒ§ã€‚ â€œä½ å›žåŽ»å§ï¼Œâ€ ç”·å­©åœ¨å²¸è¾¹åä¸‹ã€‚å†°å†·çš„å¯‚é™åˆºç©¿äº†é»‘æš—ã€‚â€œä½ è¿˜æœ‰æ›´é‡è¦çš„ä¸œè¥¿ã€‚â€ â€œâ€”â€” é‚£ä½ å‘¢ï¼Ÿâ€ â€œæˆ‘ï¼Ÿâ€¦â€¦ é›¨å¥³æ— ç“œã€‚â€ å¥³å­©å†æ¬¡æ‹…å¿§åœ°çœ‹äº†ä»–ä¸€çœ¼ï¼Œè½¬è¿‡èº«åŽ»ã€‚äº”å½©æ–‘æ–“çš„é»‘æ´‡æŸ“äº†è‹ç©¹ï¼Œç­‰ç”·å­©å›žè¿‡ç¥žæ¥ï¼Œå·²æ˜¯å­¤èº«ä¸€äººã€‚ ä»–å‘å‰è¿ˆäº†ä¸€æ­¥ã€‚ä¸€åº§å·¨æµªæ‰“åœ¨ä»–è„šä¸‹ï¼Œé™©äº›å°†ä»–å·ä¸ºé½‘ç²‰ã€‚è¦æ˜¯å¥¹è¿˜åœ¨è¿™é‡Œçš„è¯ï¼Œè¯´ä¸å®šå·²ç»è¢«æ’•ç¢Žäº†å‘¢ï¼Œä»–æƒ³ã€‚ ç”·å­©ä¾§è¿‡å¤´åŽ»ï¼Œè„¸ä¸Šå§‹ç»ˆæ²¡æœ‰æµ®çŽ°è¿‡å¯ä»¥ç§°ä¹‹ä¸ºè¡¨æƒ…çš„ä¸œè¥¿ã€‚å››ä¸‹çš„æ°´é›¾æ‰©æ•£å¼€æ¥ï¼Œåƒç‹°ç‹žçš„æ°´æ¯çš„è§¦æ‰‹ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œç®ç´§äº†æ²¼åº•çš„å¤©ç©ºã€‚ â€œå¦‚ä½•ï¼Ÿâ€ å¥¹é—®é“ã€‚ â€œè¿˜å¥½å§ï¼Œâ€ ä»–æ²¡æœ‰æŠ¬å¤´ï¼Œâ€œå°±æ˜¯è¿˜å¾—å†é€‚åº”ä¸€ç‚¹æ—¶é—´ã€‚éœ€è¦é‡é“¸çš„äº‹æƒ…å¤ªå¤šäº†ã€‚â€ â€œæˆ–è®¸å§ï¼Œâ€ å¥¹é™„å’Œé“ã€‚ å¥¹çš„ç›®å…‰æœ›å‘çª—å¤–ï¼šé›ªèŠ±ä»Žå¤©ä¸­é£˜è½ï¼Œç»™è‘±èŒçš„æ ‘å¶æŠ¹ä¸Šäº†ä¸€å±‚ç™½éœœã€‚ â€œæŠ±æ­‰äº†ã€‚â€ ç”·å­©ç‚¹äº†ç‚¹å¤´ã€‚ # ç½‘ç»œæµï¼šæ¨¡æ¿ # P3376 ç½‘ç»œæœ€å¤§æµï¼ˆDinicï¼‰ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 11000, M = 110000;const int INF = 0x7fffffff;struct node { int u, v, w, next;} e[M << 1];int cur[N], h[N], tot;int dfn[N], ans, n, m, s, t;void add(int u, int v, int w) { e[tot] = node({u, v, w, h[u]}); cur[u] = h[u] = tot++;}bool bfs() { memset(dfn, 0, sizeof dfn); queue<int> q; dfn[s] = 1; q.push(s); while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); for(int i = h[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; if(e[i].w and !dfn[v]) { dfn[v] = dfn[u] + 1; q.push(v); if(v == t) return true; } } } return false;}int dfs(int u, int low) { if(u == t) return low; int w = low; for(int i = cur[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; cur[u] = i; if(e[i].w and dfn[v] == dfn[u] + 1) { int f = dfs(v, min(w, e[i].w)); e[i].w -= f; e[i^1].w += f; w -= f; if(!w) break; } } return low - w;}void dinic() { while(bfs()) { memcpy(cur, h, sizeof cur); ans += dfs(s, INF); }}int main() { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &n, &m, &s, &t); memset(h, -1, sizeof h); for(int i=1, u, v, w; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &w); add(u, v, w); add(v, u, 0); } dinic(); printf("%d
", ans); return 0;}# P3381 æœ€å°è´¹ç”¨æœ€å¤§æµï¼ˆå•è·¯å¢žå¹¿ï¼‰ # Dijkstra #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <queue>using namespace std;#define il inlineconst int N = 5500, M = 55000, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;struct point { int u, val; point(int _u = 0, int _val = 0): u(_u), val(_val) {} bool operator < (const point &o) const { return val > o.val; } };priority_queue <point> q;struct node { int u, v, w, f, next; node() {}} e[M << 1];int head[N], tot = 0;il void add(int u, int v, int w, int f) { e[tot].u = u, e[tot].v = v, e[tot].w = w, e[tot].f = f; e[tot].next = head[u]; head[u] = tot++;}int h[N], dis[N], flow[N], pre[N];int n, m, s, t;int maxflow = 0, mincost = 0;il bool dijkstra() { memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof dis); memset(flow, 0x3f, sizeof flow); memset(pre, -1, sizeof pre); dis[s] = 0; q.push(point(s, 0)); while (!q.empty()) { int u = q.top().u, val = q.top().val; q.pop(); if (val > dis[u]) continue; for (int i = head[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; if (e[i].w and dis[v] > dis[u] + e[i].f + h[u] - h[v]) { pre[v] = i; flow[v] = min(flow[u], e[i].w); dis[v] = dis[u] + e[i].f + h[u] - h[v]; q.push(point(v, dis[v])); } } } return dis[t] != INF;}il void check() { for (int p = pre[t]; p != -1; p = pre[e[p].u]) { e[p].w -= flow[t]; e[p^1].w += flow[t]; } maxflow += flow[t]; mincost += (dis[t] - h[s] + h[t]) * flow[t]; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) h[i] += dis[i];}int main() { memset(head, -1, sizeof head); scanf("%d%d%d%d", &n, &m, &s, &t); for(int i=1, u, v, w, f; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &u, &v, &w, &f); add(u, v, w, f); add(v, u, 0, -f); } while (dijkstra()) check(); printf("%d %d
", maxflow, mincost); return 0;}# SPFA #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 5500, M = 110000, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;struct node { int u, v, w, f, next;} e[M];int h[N], tot = 0;void add(int u, int v, int w, int f) { e[tot] = {u, v, w, f, h[u]}; h[u] = tot++;}int pre[N], flow[N], dis[N];bool vis[N];int n, m, s, t, maxflow, mincost;bool spfa() { memset(pre, -1, sizeof pre); memset(vis, false, sizeof vis); memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof dis); memset(flow, 0x3f, sizeof flow); queue<int> q; q.push(s); vis[s] = true; dis[s] = 0; while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); vis[u] = false; for(int i = h[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; if(e[i].w and dis[v] > dis[u] + e[i].f) { dis[v] = dis[u] + e[i].f; pre[v] = i; flow[v] = min(flow[u], e[i].w); if(!vis[v]) { q.push(v); vis[v] = true; } } } } return dis[t] != INF;}void check() { for(int p = pre[t]; p != -1; p = pre[e[p].u]) { e[p].w -= flow[t]; e[p^1].w += flow[t]; } mincost += dis[t] * flow[t]; maxflow += flow[t];}int main() { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &n, &m, &s, &t); memset(h, -1, sizeof h); for(int i=1, u, v, w, f; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &u, &v, &w, &f); add(u, v, w, f); add(v, u, 0, -f); } while(spfa()) check(); printf("%d %d
", maxflow, mincost); return 0;}# LOJ115 æ— æºæ±‡æœ‰ä¸Šä¸‹ç•Œå¯è¡Œæµï¼ˆè¶…çº§æºæ±‡ï¼‰ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <queue>using namespace std;#define il inlineconst int N = 220, M = 11000, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;struct node { int u, v, w, next;} e[M * 6];int head[N], cur[N], tot = 0;il void add(int u, int v, int w) { e[tot] = (node) {u, v, w, head[u]}; head[u] = tot++;}int h[N], n, m, ss, tt;il bool bfs() { // åˆ†å±‚ memset(h, 0, sizeof h); memcpy(cur, head, sizeof cur); queue<int> q; q.push(ss); h[ss] = 1; while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); for(int i = head[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; if(e[i].w and !h[v]) { h[v] = h[u] + 1; if(v == tt) return true; q.push(v); } } } return false;}int dfs(int u, int low) { if(u == tt) return low; int w = low; for(int i = cur[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next, cur[u] = i) { int v = e[i].v; if(e[i].w and h[v] == h[u] + 1) { int f = dfs(v, min(w, e[i].w)); e[i].w -= f; e[i^1].w += f; w -= f; if(!w) break; } } return low - w;}int tflow = 0, sflow = 0;il void dinic() { for(int i = head[ss]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) sflow += e[i].w; // å‡ºæµé‡ while(bfs()) dfs(ss, INF); for(int i = head[tt]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) tflow += e[i].w; // å…¥æµé‡ if(sflow == tflow) { // æ»¡æµ printf("YES
"); for(int i=0; i<tot; i+=6) printf("%d
", e[i+1].w + e[i+5].w); // åè¾¹æµé‡å’Œ } else printf("NO
"); }int main() { freopen("loj115.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); memset(head, -1, sizeof head); ss = 0, tt = n+1; for(int i=1, u, v, l, h; i<=m; ++i) { // å»ºå›¾ scanf("%d%d%d%d", &u, &v, &l, &h); add(u, tt, l); add(tt, u, 0); add(ss, v, l); add(v, ss, 0); add(u, v, h-l); add(v, u, 0); } dinic(); return 0;}# æœ‰æºæ±‡æœ‰ä¸Šä¸‹ç•Œï¼ˆè½¬æ— æºæ±‡ï¼Œç„¶åŽæ–­è¾¹ï¼‰ # æœ€å¤§æµï¼ˆé¡ºæµå¢žå¹¿ï¼‰ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 220, M = 22000, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;struct node { int u, v, w, next;} e[M];int head[N], cur[N], tot = 0;void add(int u, int v, int w) { e[tot] = (node) {u, v, w, head[u]}; head[u] = tot++; e[tot] = (node) {v, u, 0, head[v]}; head[v] = tot++;}int h[N], in[N], n, m, s, t, ss, tt, sflow = 0, tflow = 0;bool bfs(int s, int t) { memset(h, 0, sizeof h); memcpy(cur, head, sizeof cur); queue<int> q; q.push(s); h[s] = 1; while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); for(int i = head[u], v; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { v = e[i].v; if(e[i].w and !h[v]) { h[v] = h[u] + 1; if(v == t) return true; q.push(v); } } } return false;}int dfs(int u, int low, int t) { if(u == t) return low; int w = low; for(int i = cur[u], v; i != -1; i = e[i].next, cur[u] = i) { v = e[i].v; if(e[i].w and h[v] == h[u] + 1) { int f = dfs(v, min(w, e[i].w), t); e[i].w -= f; e[i^1].w += f; w -= f; if(!w) break; } } return low - w;}int main() { //freopen("loj116.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d%d%d%d", &n, &m, &s, &t); ss = 0, tt = n+1; memset(head, -1, sizeof head); for(int i=1, u, v, l, h; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &u, &v, &l, &h); in[u] -= l; in[v] += l; add(u, v, h-l); } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { if(!in[i]); else if(in[i] > 0) { sflow += in[i]; add(ss, i, in[i]); } else { add(i, tt, -in[i]); } } add(t, s, INF); while(bfs(ss, tt)) tflow += dfs(ss, INF, tt); if(sflow != tflow) { printf("please go home to sleep
"); return 0; } for(int i = head[ss]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) e[i].w = e[i^1].w = 0; for(int i = head[tt]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) e[i].w = e[i^1].w = 0; int sum = e[--tot].w; e[tot-1].w = e[tot].w = 0; while(bfs(s, t)) sum += dfs(s, INF, t); printf("%d
", sum); return 0;}# æœ€å°æµï¼ˆé€†æµå¢žå¹¿ï¼‰ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 220, M = 22000, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;struct node { int u, v, w, next;} e[M];int head[N], cur[N], tot = 0;void add(int u, int v, int w) { e[tot] = (node) {u, v, w, head[u]}; head[u] = tot++; e[tot] = (node) {v, u, 0, head[v]}; head[v] = tot++;}int h[N], in[N], n, m, s, t, ss, tt, sflow = 0, tflow = 0;bool bfs(int s, int t) { memset(h, 0, sizeof h); memcpy(cur, head, sizeof cur); queue<int> q; q.push(s); h[s] = 1; while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); for(int i = head[u], v; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { v = e[i].v; if(e[i].w and !h[v]) { h[v] = h[u] + 1; if(v == t) return true; q.push(v); } } } return false;}int dfs(int u, int low, int t) { if(u == t) return low; int w = low; for(int i = cur[u], v; i != -1; i = e[i].next, cur[u] = i) { v = e[i].v; if(e[i].w and h[v] == h[u] + 1) { int f = dfs(v, min(w, e[i].w), t); e[i].w -= f; e[i^1].w += f; w -= f; if(!w) break; } } return low - w;}int main() { //freopen("loj116.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d%d%d%d", &n, &m, &s, &t); ss = 0, tt = n+1; memset(head, -1, sizeof head); for(int i=1, u, v, l, h; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &u, &v, &l, &h); in[u] -= l; in[v] += l; add(u, v, h-l); } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { if(!in[i]); else if(in[i] > 0) { sflow += in[i]; add(ss, i, in[i]); } else { add(i, tt, -in[i]); } } add(t, s, INF); while(bfs(ss, tt)) tflow += dfs(ss, INF, tt); if(sflow != tflow) { printf("please go home to sleep
"); return 0; } for(int i = head[ss]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) e[i].w = e[i^1].w = 0; for(int i = head[tt]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) e[i].w = e[i^1].w = 0; int sum = e[--tot].w; e[tot-1].w = e[tot].w = 0; while(bfs(s, t)) sum += dfs(s, INF, t); printf("%d
", sum); return 0;}

posts.text: # ç½‘ç»œæµï¼šDijkstra æ±‚è´¹ç”¨æµ æ³¨ï¼šä¸‹æ–‡ä¸­çš„è¾¹æƒ www å‡è¡¨ç¤ºè´¹ç”¨ fffã€‚ Dijkstra ä¸èƒ½æ±‚æœ‰è´Ÿæƒè¾¹çš„æœ€çŸ­è·¯ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å¯¹ç½‘ç»œ GGG ä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹è®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªåŠ¿å‡½æ•° h(u)h(u)h(u)ï¼Œä»¥æ»¡è¶³åœ¨ä¸ŽåŽŸå›¾ç­‰ä»·çš„æ–°å›¾ä¸­çš„è¾¹æƒéžè´Ÿã€‚ # æœ€çŸ­è·¯ åœ¨ä»»æ„æ®‹ç•™ç½‘ç»œä¸­çš„ä»»æ„è¾¹ (u,v)(u,v)(u,v) éƒ½éœ€è¦æ»¡è¶³ï¼š wu,v+h(u)âˆ’h(v)â‰¥0w_{u, v}+h(u) - h(v)â‰¥0 wu,vâ€‹+h(u)âˆ’h(v)â‰¥0 ä»¤å›¾ GGG çš„ç­‰ä»·å›¾ä¸º Gâ€²G'Gâ€²ï¼Œå…¶å¯¹åº”çš„è¾¹ (u,v)(u,v)(u,v) çš„æƒå€¼ä¸º wu,vâ€²=wu,v+h(u)âˆ’h(v)w'_{u,v} = w_{u,v} + h(u) - h(v) wu,vâ€²â€‹=wu,vâ€‹+h(u)âˆ’h(v) å› æ­¤ï¼Œå¯¹äºŽåŽŸå›¾ä¸­çš„ä»»æ„ä¸€æ¡è·¯å¾„ (u1,u2,â€¦,uk)(u_1,u_2,\dots,u_k)(u1â€‹,u2â€‹,â€¦,ukâ€‹)ï¼Œå®ƒåœ¨ GGG ä¸­çš„æƒå€¼ä¸º wu1,u2+wu2,u3+â‹¯+wukâˆ’1,ukw_{u_1,u_2}+w_{u_2,u_3}+\dots+w_{u_{k-1},u_k} wu1â€‹,u2â€‹â€‹+wu2â€‹,u3â€‹â€‹+â‹¯+wukâˆ’1â€‹,ukâ€‹â€‹ åœ¨ Gâ€²G'Gâ€² ä¸­çš„æƒå€¼å¯åŒ–ç®€ä¸º wu1,u2+wu2,u3+â‹¯+wukâˆ’1,uk+h(u1)âˆ’h(uk)w_{u_1,u_2} + w_{u_2,u_3} + \dots + w_{u_{k-1}, u_k} + h(u_1)-h(u_k) wu1â€‹,u2â€‹â€‹+wu2â€‹,u3â€‹â€‹+â‹¯+wukâˆ’1â€‹,ukâ€‹â€‹+h(u1â€‹)âˆ’h(ukâ€‹) æ‰€ä»¥ï¼Œåœ¨ Gâ€²G'Gâ€² æ±‚å‡ºçš„è·¯å¾„éƒ½å¯ä»¥å¯¹åº”åˆ° GGG ä¸Šã€‚ ä»¤ dud_{u}duâ€‹ ä¸ºå›¾ GGG ä¸­æºç‚¹ sss åˆ°ç‚¹ uuu çš„æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„ï¼Œå›¾ Gâ€²G'Gâ€² ä¸­ä¸º duâ€²d'_{u}duâ€²â€‹ï¼Œæ˜¾ç„¶æœ‰ du,v=du,vâ€²âˆ’h(u)+h(v)d_{u,v} = d'_{u,v}-h(u)+h(v) du,vâ€‹=du,vâ€²â€‹âˆ’h(u)+h(v) æ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦æ±‚ Gâ€²G'Gâ€² çš„æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„ï¼Œå°±èƒ½å¯¹åº”å›žåŽŸå›¾çš„æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„ã€‚ # åŠ¿å‡½æ•° # åˆå€¼ å¦‚æžœç½‘ç»œ GGG åˆå§‹è¾¹æƒéžè´Ÿï¼Œåˆ™ä»¤ h(u)=0h(u)=0h(u)=0 ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å¯ä»¤ h(u)=dis[u]h(u) = dis[u]h(u)=dis[u]ï¼ˆç”¨ SPFA è§£å†³ï¼‰ã€‚ è¯æ˜Žç•¥ã€‚ # ç»´æŠ¤ æ¯æ¬¡å¢žå¹¿åŽï¼Œä»¤ h(u)=h(u)+dis[u]h(u)=h(u)+dis[u]h(u)=h(u)+dis[u] å³å¯ã€‚ è¯æ˜Žï¼šå¯¹äºŽæ®‹ä½™ç½‘ç»œä¸Šçš„ä»»æ„è¾¹ (u,v)(u,v)(u,v)ï¼Œå‡æœ‰ dis[u]+wu,v+h(u)âˆ’h(v)â‰¥dis[v]dis[u]+w_{u,v}+h(u)-h(v)â‰¥dis[v] dis[u]+wu,vâ€‹+h(u)âˆ’h(v)â‰¥dis[v] ç§»é¡¹ï¼Œå¾— wu,v+(h(u)+dis[u])âˆ’(h(v)+dis[v])â‰¥0w_{u,v}+(h(u)+dis[u])-(h(v)+dis[v]) \geq 0 wu,vâ€‹+(h(u)+dis[u])âˆ’(h(v)+dis[v])â‰¥0 è¯æ¯•ã€‚ # P3381 ï¼»æ¨¡æ¿ï¼½æœ€å°è´¹ç”¨æœ€å¤§æµ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <queue>using namespace std;#define il inlineconst int N = 5500, M = 55000, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;struct point { int u, val; point(int _u = 0, int _val = 0): u(_u), val(_val) {} bool operator < (const point &o) const { return val > o.val; } };priority_queue <point> q;struct node { int u, v, w, f, next; node() {}} e[M << 1];int head[N], tot = 0;il void add(int u, int v, int w, int f) { e[tot].u = u, e[tot].v = v, e[tot].w = w, e[tot].f = f; e[tot].next = head[u]; head[u] = tot++;}int h[N], dis[N], flow[N], pre[N];int n, m, s, t;int maxflow = 0, mincost = 0;il bool dijkstra() { memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof dis); memset(flow, 0x3f, sizeof flow); memset(pre, -1, sizeof pre); dis[s] = 0; q.push(point(s, 0)); while (!q.empty()) { int u = q.top().u, val = q.top().val; q.pop(); if (val > dis[u]) continue; for (int i = head[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; if (e[i].w and dis[v] > dis[u] + e[i].f + h[u] - h[v]) { pre[v] = i; flow[v] = min(flow[u], e[i].w); dis[v] = dis[u] + e[i].f + h[u] - h[v]; q.push(point(v, dis[v])); } } } return dis[t] != INF;}il void check() { for (int p = pre[t]; p != -1; p = pre[e[p].u]) { e[p].w -= flow[t]; e[p^1].w += flow[t]; } maxflow += flow[t]; mincost += (dis[t] - h[s] + h[t]) * flow[t]; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) h[i] += dis[i];}int main() { freopen("p3381.in", "r", stdin); memset(head, -1, sizeof head); scanf("%d%d%d%d", &n, &m, &s, &t); for(int i=1, u, v, w, f; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &u, &v, &w, &f); add(u, v, w, f); add(v, u, 0, -f); } while (dijkstra()) check(); printf("%d %d\n", maxflow, mincost); return 0;}

# ç½‘ç»œæµï¼šæ¶ˆåœˆç®—æ³• æ³¨ï¼šä¸‹æ–‡ä¸­çš„æƒå‡è¡¨ç¤ºè´¹ç”¨ã€‚ # æ¶ˆåœˆå®šç† åœ¨æŸä¸ªæµ fff ä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚æžœå…¶æ®‹ä½™ç½‘ç»œä¸­æ²¡æœ‰è´Ÿåœˆï¼ˆå‰©ä½™æµé‡ä¸º 000 çš„è¾¹è§†ä¸ºä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼‰ï¼Œé‚£å®ƒä¸€å®šæ˜¯å½“å‰æµé‡ä¸‹çš„æœ€å°è´¹ç”¨ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¸€å®šä¸æ˜¯ã€‚ # è¯æ˜Ž å‡è®¾ä¸€ä¸ªç½‘ç»œï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰è¾¹çš„å®¹é‡éƒ½æ˜¯ 111ã€‚ å¦‚æžœæµé‡èµ°ä¸Šè·¯çš„è¯ï¼Œå…¶æ®‹ä½™ç½‘ç»œï¼ˆé»‘ç®­å¤´ï¼‰å˜ä¸ºï¼š å› ä¸ºä¸Šè·¯çš„è¾¹çš„æµé‡å æ»¡äº†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥çŽ°åœ¨ä¸Šè·¯åªæœ‰åè¾¹ã€‚ æ˜¾ç„¶ Aâ†’Câ†’tâ†’Bâ†’AA ightarrow C ightarrow t ightarrow B ightarrow AAâ†’Câ†’tâ†’Bâ†’A ä¸ºè´Ÿåœˆï¼Œæ²¿æ­¤è´Ÿåœˆå¢žå¹¿ï¼ˆæ¯æ¡è¾¹çš„æµé‡ï¼‹1ï¼‰ï¼ŒçŽ¯ä¸Šæ¯ä¸ªç‚¹çš„å…¥æµé‡ä»ç„¶ç­‰äºŽå‡ºæµé‡ï¼ˆåŽŸæµä¸ºå¯è¡Œæµï¼‰ã€‚ æµé‡åœ¨åœˆä¸­å¢žå¹¿ï¼Œæ€»çš„æµé‡æ—¢æ²¡æœ‰å¢žåŠ ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ²¡æœ‰å‡å°‘ï¼Œåªä¸è¿‡æ˜¯æµé‡ä»Žè´¹ç”¨æ›´å°‘çš„åœ°æ–¹æµè¿‡ ï¼ˆAâ†’Câ†’tA ightarrow C ightarrow tAâ†’Câ†’tï¼‰ï¼Œä»Žè´¹ç”¨å¤§çš„åœ°æ–¹é€€æµè€Œå·²ï¼ˆtâ†’Bâ†’At ightarrow B ightarrow Atâ†’Bâ†’Aï¼‰ï¼Œæµè¿‡çš„æµé‡å’Œé€€æŽ‰çš„æµé‡æ˜¯ç›¸ç­‰çš„ï¼Œå®žè´¨ä¸Šåªæ˜¯å°†ä»Ž AAA æµå‡ºçš„æµé‡çš„æ–¹å‘æ”¹å˜ï¼Œä½¿å¾—è´¹ç”¨æ›´å°ã€‚ ç½‘ç»œæµçš„åè¾¹ç»™äº†æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸€ä¸ªå¾ˆå¥½çš„åæ‚”æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œä½¿å¾—æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å¯¹ä»»æ„ä¸€ä¸ªæµ fffï¼Œé€šè¿‡æ¶ˆè´Ÿåœˆï¼ˆå¯èƒ½ä¸æ­¢ä¸€ä¸ªï¼‰ï¼Œæ¥å¾—åˆ°å®ƒå½“å‰æµé‡ä¸‹çš„æœ€å°è´¹ç”¨æµã€‚ å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°ï¼Œæ²¿ç€è´Ÿåœˆå¢žå¹¿ä¹‹åŽï¼Œå·²ç»æ²¡æœ‰è´Ÿåœˆå­˜åœ¨äº†ï¼Œå·²ç»è¾¾åˆ°äº†å½“å‰æµé‡ä¸‹çš„æœ€å°è´¹ç”¨æµï¼ˆä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æœ€å°è´¹ç”¨æœ€å¤§æµï¼‰ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥åªè¦æœ‰è´Ÿåœˆï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥å¢žå¹¿è¾¾åˆ°æ›´å°è´¹ç”¨ã€‚ # åº”ç”¨ æ±‚æœ€å°è´¹ç”¨æœ€å¤§æµæ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å…ˆè·‘å‡ºä¸€æ¡å¯è¡Œæœ€å¤§æµï¼Œç„¶åŽé€šè¿‡ä¸æ–­æ¶ˆåœˆè°ƒæ•´å‡ºæœ€å°è´¹ç”¨ã€‚ æ›´å¹¿æ³›ç”¨äºŽæ®‹ä½™ç½‘ç»œå¯»æ‰¾æ›´ä¼˜è§£ã€‚ # POJ2175 Evacuation Plan # é¢˜é¢ åŽŸé¢˜é¢å¾ˆé•¿ã€‚ ç»™å‡ºå·²è¾¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§æµçš„æ®‹ä½™ç½‘ç»œï¼Œæ±‚å‡ºå…¶æ˜¯å¦å·²è¾¾åˆ°æœ€å°è´¹ç”¨ï¼Œå¦‚æžœæœªè¾¾åˆ°åˆ™æ‰¾å‡ºæ›´ä¼˜æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚ # æ€è·¯ æ¶ˆåœˆæ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œå»ºå‡ºç½‘ç»œåŽåˆ©ç”¨ SPFAï¼Œå¦‚æžœä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹è¢«æ›´æ–°äº† nnn æ¬¡åˆ™è¯´æ˜Žå›¾ä¸­ä¸€å®šå­˜åœ¨è´ŸçŽ¯ã€‚é¢˜ç›®ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰è¯´å¿…é¡»æ˜¯æœ€ä¼˜è§£ï¼Œå› æ­¤åªè¦å°†è´Ÿåœˆä¸Šçš„æµé‡è°ƒæ•´ 111 å³å¯ã€‚ æ³¨æ„ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹è¢«æ›´æ–° nnn æ¬¡ä¸ä»£è¡¨å…¶ä¸€å®šåœ¨è´Ÿæƒåœˆå†…ã€‚æ­£ç¡®åšæ³•æ˜¯ä»Žè¿™ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ vvv å¼€å§‹ä¸æ–­æ¯å®ƒçš„å‰é©±ï¼Œå¦‚æžœå‘çŽ°æŸä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ uuu è¢«è®¿é—®äº†ä¸¤éï¼Œåˆ™è¯´æ˜Ž uuu ä¸€å®šåœ¨è´Ÿæƒåœˆå†…ï¼Œå†æ ¹æ® uuu åŽ»æ¯å‰é©±è°ƒæ•´è´Ÿæƒåœˆã€‚ # å›¾è§£ å¥½åƒæœ‰å‡ ä¸ªåœ°æ–¹æ ‡é”™äº† QAQ å‡‘åˆçœ‹å§ # ä»£ç  #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <queue>using namespace std;#define il inlinetemplate <typename T> il T abs(T x) { return x > 0 ? x : -x; }const int N = 110, M = N * N << 1, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;struct coor { int x, y, z;} a[N], b[N];struct node { int u, v, w, f, next;} e[M];int h[N << 1], tot = 0;bool vis[N << 1];int n, m, s, t;int cnt[N << 1], pre[N << 1];il void add(int u, int v, int w, int f) { e[tot] = (node) {u, v, w, f, h[u]}; h[u] = tot++;}int bp[N][N], dis[N << 1], p[N][N], occ[N];deque<int> q;bool cyc[N << 1];il void check(int v) { do { cyc[v] = true; v = e[pre[v]].u; } while(!cyc[v]); int u = v; do { --e[pre[v]].w; ++e[pre[v]^1].w; v = e[pre[v]].u; } while(u != v); for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) for(int j = h[n+i]; j != -1; j = e[j].next) if(e[j].v != t) bp[e[j].v][i] = e[j].w; printf("SUBOPTIMAL
"); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { for(int j=1; j<=m; ++j) printf("%d ", bp[i][j]); printf("
"); }}int main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d%d%d", &a[i].x, &a[i].y, &a[i].z); for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) scanf("%d%d%d", &b[i].x, &b[i].y, &b[i].z); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) for(int j=1; j<=m; ++j) scanf("%d", &p[i][j]), occ[j] += p[i][j]; memset(h, -1, sizeof h); s = 0, t = n+m+1; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { add(s, i, a[i].z, 0); add(i, s, 0, 0); } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { for(int j=1; j<=m; ++j) { int f = abs(a[i].x - b[j].x) + abs(a[i].y - b[j].y) + 1; add(i, n+j, INF, f); add(n+j, i, p[i][j], -f); } } for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) { add(n+i, t, b[i].z - occ[i], 0); add(t, n+i, occ[i], 0); } memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof dis); q.push_front(s); vis[s] = true; ++cnt[s]; dis[s] = 0; while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop_front(); vis[u] = false; for(int i = h[u]; i != -1; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; if(e[i].w and dis[v] > dis[u] + e[i].f) { pre[v] = i; dis[v] = dis[u] + e[i].f; if(!vis[v]) { if(!q.empty() and dis[v] >= dis[q.front()]) q.push_back(v); else q.push_front(v); vis[v] = true; ++cnt[v]; if(cnt[v] == t+1) { check(v); return 0; } } } } } printf("OPTIMAL
"); return 0;}ç®—æ³•è¯æ˜Žä¸­çš„å›¾ç‰‡å¼•è‡ª Sengxianâ€™s Blogã€‚
