# å°ºå–æ³• ä¸Žå•è°ƒé˜Ÿåˆ—ç›¸å…³ è¦æ±‚åœ¨æ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œé•¿åº¦è¶Šé•¿ï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆè¶Šå¥½ï¼ˆä¸‹ç®€ç§°å…·æœ‰å•è°ƒæ€§ï¼‰. åˆ©ç”¨åŒæŒ‡é’ˆ l,rl,rl,r åŠé˜Ÿåˆ—æ€æƒ³ï¼Œå¯¹äºŽåŒä¸€ä¸ª lll è®© rrr å°½å¯èƒ½å»¶ä¼¸è‡³æœ€è¿œï¼Œå¾—åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªç­”æ¡ˆåŒºé—´ï¼Œrrr å·²åˆ°è¾¾æœ€è¿œåŽå°†ä¸Ž lll æœ‰å…³çš„ä¿¡æ¯å¼¹å‡ºï¼Œå¯¹äºŽå¤šä¸ªç­”æ¡ˆåŒºé—´æ‰¾å‡ºæœ€ä¼˜è§£ï¼Ž # HDU5178 Pairs # é¢˜é¢ æœ‰ nnn ä¸ªå€¼ x1,x2,â€¦,xnx_1, x_2, \dots,x_nx1â€‹,x2â€‹,â€¦,xnâ€‹ï¼Œæ±‚ä½¿å¾— âˆ£xbâˆ’xaâˆ£â©½k,a<b|x_b-x_a|\leqslant k,a<bâˆ£xbâ€‹âˆ’xaâ€‹âˆ£â©½k,a<b çš„æ•°å¯¹ (a,b)(a,b)(a,b) çš„ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Ž # è§£ åˆ†æžå¯çŸ¥ a<ba<ba<b è¿™ä¸€æ¡ä»¶åªæ˜¯ç¡®ä¿æ— é‡å¤ï¼Œæ¬¡åºå…¶å®žå¯¹äºŽæœ€ç»ˆç­”æ¡ˆæ²¡æœ‰å½±å“ï¼Ž è€ƒè™‘å…ˆå¯¹ xxx æŽ’åºï¼ˆå› åŽŸé¢˜ç›®æœ‰ç»å¯¹å€¼ï¼Œæ— å½±å“ï¼‰ï¼Œforâ€‹ lll å°ºå–å‡ºæœ€è¿œçš„ rrrï¼Œ åˆ™ (l,r](l,r](l,r] é—´çš„æ¯ä¸ªæ•°å‡ä¸Ž lll æž„æˆåˆæ³•æ•°å¯¹ï¼Ž # ä»£ç  #include <stdio.h>#include <algorithm>const int N = 110000;typedef long long LL;int T, n;LL k, x[N];int main() { freopen("hdu5178.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d", &T); while(T--) { scanf("%d%lld", &n, &k); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%lld", x+i); std::sort(x+1, x+n+1); LL ans = 0; for(int l=1, r=2; l<=n; ++l) { for(; r <= n and x[r] - x[l] <= k; ++r); ans += r - l - 1; } printf("%lld
", ans); } return 0;}# HDU6119 å°å°ç²‰ä¸åº¦åº¦ç†Š ç±»ä¼¼ CF1041D Glider # é¢˜é¢ ç»™å‡º nnn ä¸ªå·²ç­¾åˆ°çš„å¤©æ•°åŒºé—´ï¼Œmmm å¼ è¡¥ç­¾å¡ï¼Œæ±‚å¯èŽ·å¾—çš„æœ€å¤§è¿žç»­ç­¾åˆ°æ—¶é•¿ã€‚ # è§£ å°ºå–æ¨¡æ¿ã€‚ å¤©æ•°åŒºé—´å¯é‡å ï¼Œé¡»è¿›è¡Œåˆå¹¶ã€‚ éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œå½“å·²ç¡®å®šæœ€é•¿åˆæ³•åŒºé—´ [l,r][l,r][l,r] åŽï¼ˆå³ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªåŒºé—´ä¸Ž rrr çš„è·ç¦»å¤§äºŽå‰©ä½™çš„è¡¥ç­¾å¡æ•°é‡ï¼Œè¿žä¸ä¸Šï¼‰ï¼Œåº”æŠŠå‰©ä½™è¡¥ç­¾å¡å…¨éƒ¨åº”ç”¨åˆ° rrr ä¹‹åŽçš„å¤©æ•°ä¸Šå¾—åˆ°æ›´ä¼˜è§£ã€‚ # ä»£ç  è¾¹ç•Œæ¡ä»¶è¾ƒå¤šã€‚ RRR ä¸ºå·²åŠ å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—çš„æœ€åŽä¸€ä¸ªåŒºé—´ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­çš„æ˜¯åŒºé—´ R+1R+1R+1 çš„åˆæ³•æ€§ã€‚ ç‰¹åˆ¤ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªåŒºé—´ï¼Œå¼€å§‹æ—¶ sumsumsum ç›´æŽ¥åŠ ä¸Šç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå·²ç­¾åˆ°åŒºé—´çš„é•¿ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ 000 å¼ è¡¥ç­¾å¡ã€‚ #include <stdio.h>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 110000;struct node { int l, r;} a[N], b[N];bool flag[N];bool cmp(node a, node b) { return a.l < b.l; }int n, m;int max(int a, int b) { return a > b ? a : b; }int main() { freopen("hdu6119.in", "r", stdin); while(scanf("%d%d", &n, &m) != EOF) { for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d%d", &b[i].l, &b[i].r), flag[i] = false; sort(b+1, b+n+1, cmp); for(int i=2; i<=n; ++i) { if(b[i-1].r >= b[i].l) { b[i].l = b[i-1].l; b[i].r = max(b[i].r, b[i-1].r); flag[i-1] = true; } } int tot = 0; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { if(flag[i]) continue; a[++tot].l = b[i].l; a[tot].r = b[i].r; } int sum = a[1].r - a[1].l + 1, f = 0, ans = 0; for(int L = 1, R = 1; L <= tot; ++L) { for(; R + 1 <= tot and f + a[R+1].l - a[R].r - 1 <= m; ++R) sum += a[R+1].r - a[R].r, f += a[R+1].l - a[R].r - 1; ans = max(ans, sum + m - f); sum -= a[L+1].l - a[L].l; f -= a[L+1].l - a[L].r - 1; } printf("%d
", ans); } return 0;}# HDU1937 Finding Seats # é¢˜é¢ ç”µå½±é™¢æœ‰ RRR è¡Œ CCC åˆ—ï¼Œç”¨ '.' è¡¨ç¤ºç©ºåº§ï¼Œ 'X' è¡¨ç¤ºä¸å¯é€‰ã€‚ è¦æ±‚é€‰æ‹©è‡³å°‘ KKK ä¸ªç©ºåº§ä½ (xi,yi)(x_i, y_i)(xiâ€‹,yiâ€‹)ï¼Œä½¿å¾— (maxâ¡xiâˆ’minâ¡xi)â‹…(maxâ¡yiâˆ’minâ¡yi),1â©½iâ©½K(\max x_i -\min x_i)\cdot(\max y_i -\min y_i),1\leqslant i \leqslant K (maxxiâ€‹âˆ’minxiâ€‹)â‹…(maxyiâ€‹âˆ’minyiâ€‹),1â©½iâ©½K æœ€å°ã€‚ # è§£ äºŒç»´å°ºå–ã€‚ æžšä¸¾é¢˜ç›®æ‰€æ±‚é•¿æ–¹å½¢çš„ä¸Šä¸‹ç•Œï¼Œå°ºå–æ±‚å‡ºå·¦å³æœ€çŸ­è·ç¦»ã€‚ç”¨äºŒç»´å‰ç¼€å’Œç®€åŒ–ç©ºä½æŸ¥æ‰¾ã€‚ # ä»£ç  #include <stdio.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 330;int row, c, k;char str[N];int s[N][N];int query(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2) { return s[x2][y2] - s[x1-1][y2] - s[x2][y1-1] + s[x1-1][y1-1];}int main() { freopen("hdu1937.in", "r", stdin); while(true) { scanf("%d%d%d", &row, &c, &k); if(row == 0 and c == 0 and k == 0) break; for(int i=1; i<=row; ++i) { scanf("%s", str+1); int sum = 0; for(int j=1; j<=c; ++j) { sum += (str[j] == '.' ? 1 : 0); s[i][j] = s[i-1][j] + sum; } } int ans = 0x7fffffff; for(int up = 1; up <= row; ++up) { for(int down = up; down <= row; ++down) { for(int l=1, r=1; l<=c; ++l) { for(; r<=c; ++r) { if(query(up, l, down, r) >= k) { ans = min(ans, (down - up + 1) * (r - l + 1)); break; } } } } } printf("%d
", ans); } return 0;}# HDU5358 First One # é¢˜é¢ æœ‰ä¸€æ•°åˆ— a1,a2,â€¦,ana_1, a_2, \dots, a_na1â€‹,a2â€‹,â€¦,anâ€‹ï¼Œæ±‚ âˆ‘i=1nâˆ‘j=in(i+j)(âŒŠlogâ¡2âˆ‘k=ijakâŒ‹+1)\sum_{i=1}^{n} \sum_{j=i}^{n} (i + j)(\lfloor \log_2 \sum_{k=i}^{j} a_k floor + 1) i=1âˆ‘nâ€‹j=iâˆ‘nâ€‹(i+j)(âŒŠlog2â€‹k=iâˆ‘jâ€‹akâ€‹âŒ‹+1) çš„å€¼ã€‚ç‰¹åˆ«åœ°ï¼Œlogâ¡20=0\log_20=0log2â€‹0=0ã€‚ # è§£ è§‚å¯Ÿä¸Šå¼ï¼Œå¯¹äºŽ âŒŠlogâ¡âŒ‹\lfloor\logfloorâŒŠlogâŒ‹ æ¥è¯´ï¼Œå®ƒçš„ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼å¯å¯¹åº”å¾ˆå¤šä¸ªçœŸæ•°ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘åˆ†å—ã€‚ æžšä¸¾ âŒŠlogâ¡2âˆ‘k=ijakâŒ‹\lfloor \log_2 \sum_{k=i}^{j} a_k floorâŒŠlog2â€‹âˆ‘k=ijâ€‹akâ€‹âŒ‹ çš„æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼ï¼ˆ1~34ï¼‰ã€‚ ä»¤ v=âŒŠlogâ¡2âˆ‘k=ijakâŒ‹v =\lfloor \log_2 \sum_{k=i}^{j} a_k floor v=âŒŠlog2â€‹k=iâˆ‘jâ€‹akâ€‹âŒ‹ sum=âˆ‘k=ijaksum = \sum_{k=i}^{j}a_k sum=k=iâˆ‘jâ€‹akâ€‹ åˆ™ sumâˆˆ[2vâˆ’1,2v)sum \in [2^{v-1},2^v) sumâˆˆ[2vâˆ’1,2v) ç”¨å°ºå–æ±‚å‡ºéƒ¨åˆ†å’Œåœ¨æ­¤èŒƒå›´çš„åŒºæ®µ [i,j][i,j][i,j]ï¼Œæ±‚å‡ºç»“æžœåŠ å…¥è®¡æ•°å™¨ã€‚ # ä»£ç  #include <stdio.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 110000;typedef long long LL;LL cl[40], a[N], s[N];int T, n;int main() { freopen("hdu5358.in", "r", stdin); cl[0] = -1, cl[1] = 1; for(int i=2; i<=34; ++i) cl[i] = ((cl[i-1] + 1) << 1LL) - 1; scanf("%d", &T); while(T--) { scanf("%d", &n); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%lld", a+i); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) s[i] = s[i-1] + a[i]; LL ans = 0; for(LL k=1; k<=34; ++k) { LL l = 0, r = 0; for(LL i=1; i<=n; ++i) { for(l = max(l, i); l <= n and s[l] - s[i-1] <= cl[k-1]; ++l); for(r = max(l, r); r <= n and s[r] - s[i-1] <= cl[k]; ++r); ans += k * (i * (r-l) + (l+r-1) * (r-l) / 2); } } printf("%lld
", ans); } return 0;}# HDU6103 Kirinriki # é¢˜é¢ æœ‰ä¸¤å­—ç¬¦ä¸² A,BA,BA,Bï¼ˆä»Ž 111 ç¼–å·ï¼‰ï¼Œé•¿åº¦å‡ä¸º nnnï¼Œå®šä¹‰ dis(A,B)=âˆ‘i=1nâˆ£Aiâˆ’Bnâˆ’iâˆ£dis(A,B) = \sum_{i=1}^n|A_i-B_{n-i}| dis(A,B)=i=1âˆ‘nâ€‹âˆ£Aiâ€‹âˆ’Bnâˆ’iâ€‹âˆ£ å­—ç¬¦ä¹‹å·®å®šä¹‰ä¸ºå…¶ ASCII ç çš„å·®ã€‚ å¯¹äºŽä¸€å­—ç¬¦ä¸² SSSï¼Œæ‰¾å‡ºå®ƒçš„ä¸¤ä¸ªä¸é‡å è¿žç»­å­ä¸²ï¼Œä»–ä»¬çš„ disdisdis ä¸å¤§äºŽ mmmï¼Œæ±‚æœ€é•¿åˆæ³•å­ä¸²é•¿åº¦ã€‚ # è§£ å¯»æ‰¾å•è°ƒæ€§ï¼Œæ˜“å¾— âˆ€Sâ€²âŠ†S,Tâ€²âŠ†T:dis(Sâ€²,Tâ€²)â©½dis(S,T) orall S' \subseteq S,T'\subseteq T:dis(S',T')\leqslant dis(S,T) âˆ€Sâ€²âŠ†S,Tâ€²âŠ†T:dis(Sâ€²,Tâ€²)â©½dis(S,T) å› æ­¤å­ä¸²è¶Šé•¿è¶Šå¥½ã€‚ åˆâˆµ ecauseâˆµ âˆ€ orallâˆ€ ä¸¤ä¸ªåˆæ³•å­ä¸²ï¼Œå…¶å¿…å…³äºŽæ¯ä¸²çš„æŸä¸€ä½ç½®ï¼ˆæˆ–æŸä¸¤ä½ç½®ä¹‹é—´ï¼‰å¯¹ç§°ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘æžšä¸¾è¿™ä¸€ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹ï¼Œåˆ†ä¸Šé¢çš„ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µã€‚ æ³¨æ„åˆ°å¯¹äºŽæ¯ä¸ªå­ä¸²ï¼Œå…¶é•¿åº¦è¶Šå¤§è¶Šå¥½ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶åˆæœ‰çº¦æŸä¸Šç•Œï¼Œå¯å¯¹ç§°å°ºå–ã€‚ # ä»£ç  #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>int abs(int x) { return x > 0 ? x : -x; }int max(int a, int b) { return a > b ? a : b;}int T, n, m;char s[22000];int main() { freopen("hdu6103.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d", &T); while(T--) { scanf("%d", &m); scanf("%s", s+1); int n = strlen(s+1), ans = 0; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { int f = 0; for(int l1 = i-1, r1 = i-1, l2 = i+1, r2 = i+1; l1 > 0 and l2 <= n; --l1, ++l2) { for(; r1 > 0 and r2 <= n and f + abs(s[r1] - s[r2]) <= m; --r1, ++r2) f += abs(s[r1] - s[r2]); ans = max(ans, r2 - l2); f -= abs(s[l1] - s[l2]); } } for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { int f = 0; for(int l1 = i, r1 = i, l2 = i+1, r2 = i+1; l1 > 0 and l2 <= n; --l1, ++l2) { for(; r1 > 0 and r2 <= n and f + abs(s[r1] - s[r2]) <= m; --r1, ++r2) f += abs(s[r1] - s[r2]); ans = max(ans, r2 - l2); f -= abs(s[l1] - s[l2]); } } printf("%d
", ans); } return 0;}# POJ2739 Sum of Consecutive Prime Numbers å°ºå–æ°´é¢˜ã€‚ #include <stdio.h>#include <cmath>using namespace std;bool prime(int x) { if(x < 2) return false; int m = int(sqrt(x)); for(int i=2; i<=m; ++i) if(x % i == 0) return false; return true;}int x, p[11000];int main() { int tot = 0; for(int i=1; i<=10000; ++i) { if(prime(i)) p[++tot] = i; } while(true) { scanf("%d", &x); if(x == 0) break; int f = 0, ans = 0; for(int l=1, r=1; l<=tot; ++l) { for(; r <= tot and f + p[r] <= x; ++r) f += p[r]; if(f == x) ++ans; f -= p[l]; } printf("%d
", ans); } return 0;}# CF1198A MP3 # é¢˜é¢ ç»™å‡º n,In,In,Iã€‚ nnn - æ•°åˆ— a1,a2,...,ana_1,a_2,...,a_na1â€‹,a2â€‹,...,anâ€‹ é€‰å®šä¸€ä¸ªåŒºé—´ [l,r][l,r][l,r]ï¼Œå¹¶è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œï¼Œä½¿ vi={lvi<lvilâ©½viâ©½rrvi>rv_i =  egin{cases} l&v_i<l\ v_i&l\leqslant v_i \leqslant r\ r&v_i>r \end{cases} viâ€‹=âŽ©âŽªâŽªâŽ¨âŽªâŽªâŽ§â€‹lviâ€‹râ€‹viâ€‹<llâ©½viâ€‹â©½rviâ€‹>râ€‹ è¦æ±‚ç»è¿‡å¤„ç†åŽï¼Œæ•°åˆ—ä¸­ä¸åŒçš„æ•°çš„ä¸ªæ•° â©½2âŒŠ8I/nâŒ‹\leqslant 2^{\lfloor 8I/nfloor}â©½2âŒŠ8I/nâŒ‹ï¼Œä¸”ä½¿æ•°åˆ—ä¸­è¢«æ›´æ”¹çš„ä½ç½®çš„æ€»æ•°æœ€å°ï¼Œæ±‚è¿™ä¸ªæœ€å°å€¼ã€‚ # è§£ åŽŸé¢˜é¢è¾ƒé•¿ï¼Œéœ€è€å¿ƒçœ‹é¢˜ã€‚ å¯å…ˆå°†åŽŸæ•°åˆ—æŽ’åºå¹¶ç¦»æ•£åŒ–ï¼Œè®°ä¸‹æ¯ç§æ•°çš„å‡ºçŽ°æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œç”¨å‰ç¼€å’Œä¼˜åŒ–æ±‚å’Œã€‚å› é¡ºåºå·²é¢„å…ˆæŽ’å¥½ï¼Œç›´æŽ¥å°ºå– [l,r][l,r][l,r]ï¼Œä½¿åŒºé—´å†…çš„å€¼æœ€å¤§åŒ–ï¼Œç”¨æ€»æ•°ç›¸å‡å¾—å‡ºç­”æ¡ˆã€‚ # ä»£ç  #include <cstdio>#include <cmath>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 440000; int a[N], b[N], cnt[N], s[N], n, I, t; int power(int x) { int ans = 1, base = 2; for(; x; x >>= 1) { if(x & 1) ans *= base; if(ans > t) return ans; base *= base; } return ans;} int main() { freopen("cf1198a.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d%d", &n, &I); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d", a+i), b[i] = a[i]; if(8*I > n*((int)log2(n) + 1)) { printf("0
"); return 0; } sort(b+1, b+n+1); t = unique(b+1, b+n+1) - (b+1); int K = power(8*I/n); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { int p = lower_bound(b+1, b+t+1, a[i]) - b; ++cnt[p]; } for(int i=1; i<=t; ++i) s[i] = s[i-1] + cnt[i]; int ans = 0x7fffffff; for(int l=1, r; l<=t; ++l) { r = min(l + K - 1, t); ans = min(ans, s[t] - (s[r] - s[l-1])); } printf("%d
", ans); return 0;}# CF180E Cubes # é¢˜æ„ç®€è¿° çŽ°æœ‰ä¸€æ•°åˆ— a1,a2,â€¦,an(1â©½aiâ©½m)a_1,a_2,â€¦,a_n (1\leqslant a_i \leqslant m)a1â€‹,a2â€‹,â€¦,anâ€‹(1â©½aiâ€‹â©½m)ï¼ˆæ›´å‡†ç¡®åœ°ç¿»è¯‘çš„è¯ï¼ŒçŽ°æœ‰ä¸€æŽ’å°æ–¹å—ï¼Œç¬¬ iii ä¸ªæ–¹å—çš„é¢œè‰²ä¸º aia_iaiâ€‹ï¼‰ï¼Œæ±‚åœ¨æœ€å¤šåˆ åŽ» kkk ä¸ªä½ç½®çš„æ•°åŽï¼Œæ‰€èƒ½èŽ·å¾—çš„æœ€é•¿è¿žç»­å­æ®µçš„é•¿åº¦ï¼Œè¦æ±‚è¯¥å­æ®µä¸­æ‰€æœ‰æ•°å‡ç›¸åŒï¼Ž # è§£é‡Š å¯ä»¥ä¸åˆ æ•°ï¼Ž 1â©½nâ©½2Ã—1051 \leqslant n \leqslant 2 	imes 10^51â©½nâ©½2Ã—105ï¼Œ1â©½mâ©½1051 \leqslant m \leqslant 10^51â©½mâ©½105ï¼Œ0â©½k<n0 \leqslant k <n0â©½k<nï¼Ž æ ·ä¾‹ #1ï¼šåˆ åŽ» 5th5th5th å’Œ 6th6th6thï¼Ž æ ·ä¾‹ #2ï¼šåˆ åŽ» 4th4th4th å’Œ 7th7th7thï¼Ž æ ·ä¾‹ #3ï¼šä¸å˜ï¼Ž # è§£ç­” æžšä¸¾æ¯ç§é¢œè‰²ï¼Œè¿™æ ·é—®é¢˜å°±å¯è¢«ç®€åŒ–ä¸ºå¯¹äºŽæ¯ç§é¢œè‰²ï¼Œæ±‚å‡ºå…¶ä¿®æ”¹åŽçš„æœ€é•¿åˆæ³•å­æ®µï¼Œå¯ç”¨å°ºå–æ³•æ±‚è§£ã€‚ å°ºå–æ³•ä¸Žå•è°ƒé˜Ÿåˆ—æœ‰å…³ï¼Œåº”ç”¨èŒƒå›´æ¯”è¾ƒå°ï¼Œè¦æ±‚åŽŸé—®é¢˜åœ¨æ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œé•¿åº¦è¶Šé•¿ï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆè¶Šå¥½ã€‚åˆ©ç”¨åŒæŒ‡é’ˆ l,rl,rl,r åŠé˜Ÿåˆ—æ€æƒ³ï¼Œå¯¹äºŽåŒä¸€ä¸ª lll è®© rrr å°½å¯èƒ½å»¶ä¼¸è‡³æœ€è¿œï¼Œå¾—åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªç­”æ¡ˆåŒºé—´ï¼Œrrr å·²åˆ°è¾¾æœ€è¿œåŽå°†ä¸Ž lll æœ‰å…³çš„ä¿¡æ¯å¼¹å‡ºï¼Œå¯¹äºŽå¤šä¸ªç­”æ¡ˆåŒºé—´æ‰¾å‡ºæœ€ä¼˜è§£ã€‚ æ›´è¯¦ç»†çš„è§£é‡Šè¯·çœ‹è¿™é‡Œ # ä»£ç  å°†åŽŸæ•°åˆ—åˆ†å—ï¼Œå¯¹æ¯ç§é¢œè‰²å»ºç«‹é“¾è¡¨ï¼Œæžšä¸¾æ—¶ç›´æŽ¥è®¿é—®ã€‚ é“¾è¡¨çš„æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹å­˜å‚¨è¯¥é¢œè‰²å—çš„å·¦å³ç«¯ç‚¹ã€‚ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 220000, M = 110000;struct node { int l, r, next;} a[N];int tmp[M], n, m, k, h[M];int main() { freopen("cf180e.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &k); int f = 0, tot = 0, ans = 0; for(int i=1, c; i<=n; ++i) { scanf("%d", &c); if(f == c) a[tot].r = i; else { a[++tot] = (node) {i, i, c, 0}; if(h[x]) a[tmp[c]].next = tmp[c] = tot; else h[x] = tmp[x] = tot; f = c; } } for(int i=1; i<=m; ++i) { if(h[i] == 0) continue; // æ— è¯¥é¢œè‰² int L = h[i], R = h[i], f = 0, sum = a[h[i]].r - a[h[i]].l + 1; for(; L; L = a[L].next) { for(; a[R].next and f + a[a[R].next].l - a[R].r - 1 <= k; R = a[R].next) f += a[a[R].next].l - a[R].r - 1, sum += a[a[R].next].r - a[a[R].next].l + 1; ans = max(ans, sum); // ç»Ÿè®¡ sum -= a[L].r - a[L].l + 1; // å¼¹å‡º f -= a[a[L].next].l - a[L].r - 1; } } printf("%d
", ans); return 0;}# CF939E Maximize! # é¢˜é¢ å¯¹äºŽä¸€ä¸ªåªåŒ…å«æ­£æ•´æ•°çš„ multiset SSSï¼Œä½ éœ€è¦æ”¯æŒä»¥ä¸‹ 222 ç§æ“ä½œï¼š 111 æ‰¾å‡º SSS çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå­é›† sssï¼Œä½¿ max(s)âˆ’mean(s)max(s)-mean(s)max(s)âˆ’mean(s) æœ€å¤§ï¼Œå¹¶è¾“å‡ºè¿™ä¸ªæœ€å¤§å€¼ã€‚ä¿ç•™åä½å°æ•°ã€‚ 222 xxx åŠ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°æ•° xxx åˆ° SSS ä¸­ï¼Œä¿è¯åŠ å…¥çš„æ•°æ˜¯é€’å¢žçš„ã€‚ # è§£ æ€ç»´é¢˜ã€‚ maxmaxmax è¶Šå¤§è¶Šå¥½ï¼Œmeanmeanmean è¶Šå°è¶Šå¥½ã€‚ ç»“è®ºä¸€ï¼šå­é›† sss ä¸­å¿…åŒ…å« maxâ¡S\max SmaxSã€‚ ç»“è®ºäºŒï¼šâˆ€xâˆˆS,xâˆ‰s,mean(s)>x:mean(s)<mean(sâˆª{x}) orall x \in S, x
otin s,mean(s) > x:mean(s) < mean(s\cup\{x\})âˆ€xâˆˆS,xâˆˆ/s,mean(s)>x:mean(s)<mean(sâˆª{x})â€‹ ã€‚ è¯æ˜Žç•¥ã€‚ # ä»£ç  ç•¥ä¸‘ã€‚ ä¸ºé˜²æ­¢ WAï¼Œç‰¹åˆ¤äº†è¾ƒå°çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œç»´æŠ¤çš„ä¹Ÿç•¥å¾®éº»çƒ¦ä¸€ç‚¹ã€‚ #include <stdio.h>const int N = 550000;typedef double LF;int Q, s[N];int main() { freopen("cf939e.in", "r", stdin); int tot = 0, f = 0; LF sum = 0, lastans = 0, lasttype = 0; scanf("%d", &Q); while(Q--) { int type; scanf("%d", &type); if(type == 1) { scanf("%d", &s[++tot]); lasttype = type; } else { if(lasttype == 2) { printf("%.10lf
", lastans); continue; } if(tot == 1) { printf("%.10lf
", (LF)0); lastans = 0; lasttype = 2; continue; } if(tot == 2) { lastans = s[2] - (s[1] + s[2]) / 2.0; printf("%.10lf
", lastans); lasttype = 2; sum = s[1], f = 1; continue; } for(int i=f+1; i<tot; ++i) { if((LF)(sum + s[tot]) / i > (LF)s[i]) f = i, sum += s[i]; else break; } lastans = s[tot] - (sum + s[tot]) / (f+1); printf("%.10lf
", lastans); lasttype = type; } } return 0;}

posts.text: # å•è°ƒé˜Ÿåˆ— å…·æœ‰å•è°ƒæ€§çš„é˜Ÿåˆ—ã€‚å½“ä¸€æ–°å€¼å‡†å¤‡å…¥é˜Ÿæ—¶ï¼Œé¡»å…ˆä»ŽåŽå‘å‰ï¼Œå°†å¯¹åŽæ¥ç­”æ¡ˆæ²¡æœ‰äº†å½±å“çš„ç‚¹å¼¹å‡ºï¼Œå†ä»Žå‰å‘åŽï¼Œå°†æ‰€æœ‰è¶…å‡ºäº†ç»Ÿè®¡èŒƒå›´çš„ç‚¹å¼¹å‡ºã€‚å¯¹äºŽå¤§å¤šæ•°é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ±‚è§£è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ä¼šé”å®šå¾ˆå¤šç­”æ¡ˆåŒºé—´ï¼Œåœ¨çº¿æ±‚æœ€å€¼ã€‚ # P3088 æ‹¥æŒ¤çš„å¥¶ç‰› # é¢˜é¢ æœ‰ NNN å¤´å¥¶ç‰›æ²¿ç€ä¸€ç»´çš„æ …æ åƒè‰ï¼Œç¬¬ iii å¤´å¥¶ç‰›åœ¨ç›®æ ‡ç‚¹ xix_ixiâ€‹ï¼Œå®ƒçš„èº«é«˜æ˜¯ hih_ihiâ€‹ ã€‚å½“ä¸€å¤´å¥¶ç‰›å·¦è¾¹ DDD è·ç¦»å†…è€Œä¸”å³è¾¹ DDD è·ç¦»å†…æœ‰èº«é«˜è‡³å°‘æ˜¯å®ƒçš„ä¸¤å€çš„å¥¶ç‰›ï¼Œå®ƒå°±ä¼šè§‰å¾—æ‹¥æŒ¤ã€‚ è¯·è®¡ç®—è§‰å¾—æ‹¥æŒ¤çš„å¥¶ç‰›çš„æ•°é‡ã€‚ # è§£ ï¼ˆå•è°ƒé˜Ÿåˆ—æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Ÿï¼‰ å½“ä¸€å¥¶ç‰›å°†è¦å…¥é˜Ÿæ—¶ï¼š ä»ŽåŽå¾€å‰ï¼Œå°†èº«é«˜å°äºŽè¯¥å¥¶ç‰›çš„å¼¹å‡ºï¼ˆ --tail ï¼‰ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå°†è¦è¿›é˜Ÿçš„å¥¶ç‰›æ›´åŠ é åŽï¼Œå½±å“èŒƒå›´ä¸€å®šæ›´å¤§ï¼Œå¯¹ç­”æ¡ˆçš„è´¡çŒ®ä¹Ÿä¸€å®šæ›´å¤§ã€‚ ä»Žå‰å¾€åŽï¼Œå°†ä¸Žè¯¥å¥¶ç‰›è·ç¦»å·²è¶…è¿‡ DDD çš„å¥¶ç‰›å¼¹å‡ºï¼ˆ ++head ï¼‰ å°†è¯¥å¥¶ç‰›å…¥é˜Ÿã€‚ ä¸Žé˜Ÿå¤´å¥¶ç‰›æ¯”è¾ƒèº«é«˜ï¼Œè‹¥ç¬¦åˆåˆ™æ‰“ä¸Šæ ‡è®°ï¼Œè‹¥å·¦å³ä¸¤æ¬¡ç»Ÿè®¡å‡ç¬¦åˆï¼Œåˆ™è®¡å…¥ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚ æ¯æ¬¡ç»Ÿè®¡çš„æ˜¯è¯¥å¥¶ç‰›å·¦ä¾§çš„åˆæ³•æ€§ï¼Œä»ŽåŽåˆ°å‰å†åšä¸€éå°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚ æŒ‰ç…§ä»¥ä¸Šè§„åˆ™å°±å¯ä»¥ç»Ÿè®¡ç­”æ¡ˆäº†ã€‚æ˜¾ç„¶è¯¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸€å®šä¸ºå•è°ƒé€’é™é˜Ÿåˆ—ã€‚ # ä»£ç  #include <stdio.h>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 55000;struct node { int x, h;} a[N];int n, d, queue[N];bool l[N], r[N];bool cmp(node a, node b) { return a.x < b.x;}int main() { freopen("p3088.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d%d", &n, &d); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d%d", &a[i].x, &a[i].h); sort(a+1, a+n+1, cmp); int head = 0, tail = 1; queue[head] = 1; for(int i=2; i<=n; ++i) { while(head < tail and a[queue[tail-1]].h <= a[i].h) --tail; queue[tail++] = i; while(head < tail and a[i].x - a[queue[head]].x > d) ++head; if(a[queue[head]].h >= (a[i].h << 1)) l[i] = true; } head = 0, tail = 1; queue[head] = n; for(int i=n-1; i>=1; --i) { while(head < tail and a[queue[tail-1]].h <= a[i].h) --tail; queue[tail++] = i; while(head < tail and a[queue[head]].x - a[i].x > d) ++head; if(a[queue[head]].h >= (a[i].h << 1)) r[i] = true; } int ans = 0; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) if(l[i] and r[i]) ++ans; printf("%d\n", ans); return 0;}# P3522 Temperature # é¢˜é¢ æœ‰ nnn ä¸ªæ®µï¼Œç¬¬ iii ä¸ªä¸º [li,ri][l_i, r_i][liâ€‹,riâ€‹]ï¼ŒçŽ°è¦åœ¨å‡ ä¸ªè¿žç»­çš„æ®µä¸­ï¼Œæ¯æ®µä¸­å„å–ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼ï¼Œæž„æˆä¸€åºåˆ—ï¼Œè¦æ±‚è¯¥åºåˆ—ä¸èƒ½ä¸‹é™ï¼Œæ±‚åºåˆ—çš„æœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦ã€‚ # è§£ ä»¥æ®µçš„å·¦ç«¯ç‚¹ç»´æŠ¤å•è°ƒåºåˆ—ã€‚ å½“ä¸€æ–°æ®µå°†è¦å…¥é˜Ÿæ—¶ï¼š ä»ŽåŽå‘å‰ï¼Œå°†æ‰€æœ‰å·¦ç‚¹æ¯”æ–°æ®µçš„å·¦ç‚¹å°çš„æ®µå¼¹å‡ºã€‚ ä»Žå‰å‘åŽï¼Œå°†æ‰€æœ‰å³ç‚¹æ¯”æ–°æ®µçš„å·¦ç‚¹å°çš„æ®µå¼¹å‡ºã€‚ ç»Ÿè®¡ç­”æ¡ˆï¼šç”¨å½“å‰ä½ç½®å‡åŽ»é˜Ÿå¤´çš„ä¸Šä¸€æ®µçš„ä½ç½® âˆµ\becauseâˆµ é˜Ÿå¤´çš„ä¸Šä¸€æ®µå·²è¢«å¼¹å‡º âˆ´\thereforeâˆ´ ä»Žé˜Ÿå¤´çš„ä¸Šä¸€æ®µçš„ä¸‹ä¸€æ®µèµ·ï¼ˆå¯èƒ½å·²è¢«å¼¹å‡ºï¼‰è‡³å½“å‰ä½ç½®å‡å±žäºŽåˆæ³•åºåˆ— # ä»£ç  #include <stdio.h>const int N = 1100000;int max(int a, int b) { return a > b ? a : b; }int n, l[N], r[N], queue[N], ans = -1;int main() { freopen("p3522.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d", &n); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) scanf("%d%d", l+i, r+i); int head = 0, tail = 1; queue[head] = 0; for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) { while(head < tail and l[i] >= l[queue[tail-1]]) --tail; queue[tail++] = i; while(head < tail and l[queue[head]] > r[i]) ++head; ans = max(ans, i - queue[head-1]); } printf("%d\n", ans); return 0;}

# commit å‘½åè§„èŒƒ feat: ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°åŠŸèƒ½ fix: ä¸€ä¸ª bug ä¿®å¤ docs: ä»…ä»…ä¿®æ”¹äº†æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ README, CHANGELOG, CONTRIBUTE ç­‰ style: ä¸å½±å“ä»£ç é€»è¾‘çš„ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ç©ºæ ¼ã€æ ¼å¼ç¼©è¿›ã€åˆ é™¤åˆ†å·ç­‰ refactor: ä»£ç é‡æž„ perf: æå‡æ€§èƒ½çš„æ”¹åŠ¨ test: å¢žåŠ æˆ–ä¿®æ”¹æµ‹è¯• chore: æ”¹å˜æž„å»ºæµç¨‹ã€æˆ–è€…å¢žåŠ è¾…åŠ©å·¥å…·ã€ä¾èµ–åº“ç­‰ # 2020.04.05 ä¿®æ”¹ï¼š 2020.02 ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰ä¿®æ”¹ä½œåºŸã€‚ # 2020.02 ä¿®æ”¹ï¼š æœ€è¿‘å–œæ¬¢ç”¨ inline ã€‚ å°½é‡é¿å…å¼ºåˆ¶ç±»åž‹è½¬æ¢ã€‚ ä½¿ç”¨æž„é€ å‡½æ•°ã€‚ # 2020.01 ä¿®æ”¹ï¼š å‡¡ç»§æ‰¿è‡ª C è¯­è¨€çš„åº“ï¼Œå‡ä½¿ç”¨ <xxx.h> è€Œä¸æ˜¯ <cxxx> ã€‚ ä»¥ä¸‹æƒ…å†µä¸­ï¼Œè¿ç®—ç¬¦å‰åŽä¸€å®šä¸åŠ ç©ºæ ¼ï¼š for å¾ªçŽ¯æ‹¬å·å†…å†…å®¹è¾ƒçŸ­æ—¶ï¼ˆe.g. for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) ï¼‰ è¿ç®—ç¬¦å‰åŽå…³ç³»è¾ƒå¯†åˆ‡æ—¶ ä»¥ä¸‹æƒ…å†µä¸­ï¼Œè¿ç®—ç¬¦å‰åŽä¸€èˆ¬ä¸åŠ ç©ºæ ¼ï¼š å˜é‡åé•¿åº¦ä¸º 1 æ—¶ ä»¥ä¸‹æƒ…å†µä¸­ï¼Œè¿ç®—ç¬¦å‰åŽå¯èƒ½ä¸åŠ ç©ºæ ¼ï¼š è€ƒè¯•å³å°†ç»“æŸæ—¶ ä»¥ä¸‹æƒ…å†µä¸­ï¼Œè¿ç®—ç¬¦å‰åŽä¸å¯èƒ½ä¸åŠ ç©ºæ ¼ï¼š é™¤ä»¥ä¸Šæƒ…å†µä¹‹å¤–çš„æ‰€æœ‰æƒ…å†µ typedef long long LL ã€‚ # e.g. ï¼ˆ 2-SAT æ¨¡æ¿èŠ‚é€‰ï¼‰ #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>#include <iostream>#include <stack>using namespace std;const int N = 2e6 + 10;struct node { int u, v, next; node() {} node(int _u, int _v, int _next): u(_u), v(_v), next(_next) {}} e[N];int h[N], tot = 0;void add(int u, int v) { e[++tot] = node(u, v, h[u]); h[u] = tot;}int dfn[N], low[N], tag = 0;int id[N], num = 0;stack<int> s;int n, m;void tarjan(int u) { dfn[u] = low[u] = ++tag; s.push(u); for(int i = h[u]; i; i = e[i].next) { int v = e[i].v; if(dfn[v]) { if(!id[v]) low[u] = min(low[u], dfn[v]); } else { tarjan(v); low[u] = min(low[u], low[v]); } } if(dfn[u] == low[u]) { id[u] = ++num; for(; s.top() != u; s.pop()) id[s.top()] = num; s.pop(); }}int main() { freopen("p4782.in", "r", stdin); scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(int i=1, _i, a, _j, b, u, v; i<=m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &_i, &a, &_j, &b); u = (_i-1)*2 + a, v = (_j-1)*2 + b; add(u^1, v); add(v^1, u); } for(int i=0; i<(n<<1); ++i) if(!dfn[i]) tarjan(i); for(int i=0; i<(n<<1); i+=2) { if(id[i] == id[i^1]) { printf("IMPOSSIBLE
"); return 0; } } printf("POSSIBLE
"); for(int i=0; i<(n<<1); i+=2) printf("%d ", id[i] < id[i^1] ? 0 : 1); return 0;}# è€ƒåœºç é£Žï¼š ï¼ˆç‰›å®¢ CSP-S æé«˜ç»„èµ›å‰é›†è®­è¥ 2 T3 - ç»´æŠ¤åºåˆ— 2019.10.31 ï¼‰ #include <cstdio> const int N = 100005, INF = 0x7fffffff;int abs(int x) { return x > 0 ? x : -x; }int min(int a, int b) { return a > b ? b : a; } struct node { int a, b, f, s; node *l, *r;} *root, pool[4*N]; struct pair { int l, r;} tmpx[N], tmpy[N]; int id = -1, cntx, cnty;int s[N];node *newnode(int a, int b) { pool[++id] = (node) {a, b, s[a], 0, NULL, NULL}; return &pool[id];} void build(node *&root, int a, int b) { root = newnode(a,b); if(a<b) { int mid = (a+b) >> 1; build(root->l, a, mid); build(root->r, mid+1, b); if(root->l->f == root->r->f) root->f = root->l->f; else root->f = 0; }} bool check(node *root, int x) { if(root->f) return (root->f == x); bool s1 = check(root->l, x); bool s2 = check(root->r, x); return (s1 or s2); } void edit(node *root, int a, int b, int x) { if(a <= root->a and root->b <= b) { root->f = x; return; } if(root->f) { root->l->f = root->f; root->r->f = root->f; root->f = 0; } int mid = (root->a + root->b) >> 1; if(a <= mid) edit(root->l, a, b, x); if(mid < b) edit(root->r, a, b, x);}bool query(node *root, int x, int y) { if(root->f) { if(root->f == x) tmpx[++cntx] = (pair) {root->a, root->b}; else if(root->f == y) tmpy[++cnty] = (pair) {root->a, root->b}; else return false; return true; } bool s1 = query(root->l, x, y); bool s2 = query(root->r, x, y); return (s1 or s2);} inline int read() { char c = getchar(); int x=0, f=1; while(c < '0' or c > '9') { f = (c == '-') ? -1 : f; c = getchar(); } while(c >='0' and c <='9') { x = (x<<3) + (x<<1) + (c-'0'); c = getchar(); } return x*f;} int lastans = 0;int main() { int n = read(), m = read(), flag = read(); for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i) s[i] = read(); build(root, 1, n); for(int ii=1; ii<=m; ++ii) { if(!flag) lastans = 0; int opt = read(); if(opt == 1) { int l = read()^lastans, r = read()^lastans, x = read()^lastans; edit(root, l, r, x); } if(opt == 2) { int x = read()^lastans, y = read()^lastans; if(x == y) { bool f = check(root, x); lastans = 0; printf("%d
", f ? 0 : -1); continue; } cntx = cnty = 0; bool f = query(root, x, y); if(!f or !cntx or !cnty) { printf("-1
"); lastans = 0; continue; } lastans = INF; for(int i=1; i<=cntx; ++i) { for(int j=1; j<=cnty; ++j) { lastans = min(lastans, abs(tmpx[i].r - tmpy[j].l)); lastans = min(lastans, abs(tmpx[i].l - tmpy[j].r)); } } printf("%d
", lastans); } } return 0;}

p->right->father = q;æ³¨æ„ Pâ€‹ å¯èƒ½æ²¡æœ‰å³å­æ ‘ï¼ˆå³ä¸å­˜åœ¨ P->right èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼‰ã€‚ ä¿®æ”¹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š q->left = p->right; if(p->right != NULL) p->right->father = q;# ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰PPP çš„å³å­æ ‘ä¿®æ”¹ä¸º QQQ ï¼Œä¸”åŒæ—¶ QQQ çš„çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¿®æ”¹ä¸º PPP ã€‚ p->right = q; root = p; return; } if(q == r->left) { r->left = p; p->father = r; } else { r->right = p; p->father = r; }æ•´ç†ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œä¸ç®¡ Qâ€‹ æœ‰æ— çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼ŒP çš„çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹å‡ä¿®æ”¹ä¸º Q çš„çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚ p->father = r;
